title: FastMem
description:
Train your brain to improve your focusing, concentrating and memorising abilities. 

This game is a good tool for everyone to enhance their mind while having fun. It enables them to increase the speed of their mind through prompt concentrating  and memorizing.
 
The icons on the puzzle display for a short while and disappear. You need to focus on their locations. Stage by stage game becomes more harder and the speed and accuracy of your short term memory is being tested. 

*Try this to give proper exercise to your brain*

title: See & Say Sight Words
description:
See & Say is a sight word learning tool which allows users to setup their own custom word list and practice pronouncing words using your device's voice recognition functionality.  With a "Play" mode and "Practice" mode, See & Say helps all learners of all ages.  The simple, yet vibrant, application design allows smooth navigation and ongoing motivation and encouragement for learners.

Download See & Say and make learning sight words FUN with See and Say Sight Words!

Yes this is true! When you give the chocolate bouquet to other it is nice feelings for both. Especially i love to give a bouquet filled by chocolate candies and other sweet desserts which is cool and nice gift for anyone on their birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, events and other casual functions! title: Reading Hero
description: Reading Hero is the only reading app that makes a game out of sight-word reading, while providing real-time feedback! We use voice recognition to tell if a word was read correctly, and give feedback with audio recordings of a real teacher! It is ideal for children ages 4-8 (pre-K to third grade) who are learning to read, or English learners of any age. Best of all, it is completely free, and has zero advertisements! Created by teachers, for anyone learning to read.

title: Periodic Table Quiz
description:
Learn the periodic table with this simple quiz app.

Quizzes include:
- Name and symbol: locate the element with the given name and symbol on the table
- The Impossible Data Quiz: do you know your elements by their data alone? You must identify elements from the given density, melting point, boiling point and atomic weight.
- Name Derivation: identify elements from the derivation of their names. Which element is named after the Greek for "unstable", or the Scandinavian God of thunder?

All quizzes are split into 10 categories: Alkali metals, alkaline earth metals, reactive non-metals, transition metals, lanthanides, actinides, post-transition metals, metalloids, noble gases, and unknown.

There is also a "whole table" category for each quiz, which takes you through all 118 elements.

title: My Special Aflac Duck
description:
My Special Aflac Duck is a smart comforting companion for children with cancer. The robotic duck features naturalistic movements and joyful play to help children communicate their feelings, practice medical procedures, and provide distraction from painful therapies. 

The My Special Aflac Duck app allows children to explore their duck’s virtual world and engage in enhanced play with their ducks. Children can use the My Special Aflac Duck app to feed their ducks, give their ducks a virtual bath, and so much more!

FEATURES
• Explore! Your friend has a rich and interactive world, tap characters to see them come to life! Can you find all of the hidden animations?
• Feed your friend. Visit the food truck to prepare a meal for your duck! Be careful, your duck might get gassy if they eat too much.
• Soundscapes. Blast off to far away planets to listen to the sounds of a forest, ocean, farm, amusement park and more. You can customize the way these planets sound to design your perfect soundscape.
• Medical play. Make a trip to the hospital to flush your duck’s lines and administer chemo.
• Bath time. Visit the lagoon to give your special friend a virtual bath. 


ENHANCED PLAY
The My Special Aflac Duck app is a free app to enhance play with My Special Aflac Duck. To find out more about how to get a duck please visit: aflac.com/myduck

ABOUT US
Aflac is a supplemental insurance provider with a philanthropic commitment to childhood cancer. For 22 years, Aflac, their employees, and independent sales agents have demonstrated a commitment to help families facing childhood cancer, including contributing more that $120 million to the cause. 

Aflac teamed up with Sproutel, a patient-centered research and development company focused on kids' health to create My Special Aflac Duck and in doing so, provide comfort and joy to children with cancer. Sproutel worked with over 100 families and 35 doctors at the Aflac Cancer Center to develop a smart companion to meet the unique needs of children undergoing treatment. To learn more about My Special Aflac Duck visit, AflacChildhoodCancer.org.

title: PI VR Human Body
description:
-Shrink down to take an amazing adventure in the human bloodstream!
-See your immune system in action by visiting your bloodstream in a virtual reality environment. Find out about vaccines, white blood cells, allergies, and more, even as you watch your body fight off infection.
-Build your knowledge with videos, photographs, animations, and more.
-Test your knowledge with built-in brain-teaser quizzes!

When prompted to scan, look for the QR Code located on the first page in your PI VR Human Body book in order to access interactive content!

If you don't have the book visit http://pilbooks.com/PIVRHumanBody/ and scan the QR Code located on the webpage!

-Shrink down to take an amazing adventure in the human bloodstream!
-See your immune system in action by visiting your bloodstream in a virtual reality environment. Find out about vaccines, white blood cells, allergies, and more, even as you watch your body fight off infection.
-Build your knowledge with videos, photographs, animations, and more.
-Test your knowledge with built-in brain-teaser quizzes!

When prompted to scan, look for the QR Code located on the first page in your PI VR Human Body book in order to access interactive content!

If you don't have the book visit http://pilbooks.com/PIVRHumanBody/ and scan the QR Code located on the webpage!
summary: Shrink down to take an amazing adventure in the human bloodstream!

title: Understanding Cancer (Light)
description:
The premise of this App is primarily educational. But, the App gives a stimulating approach to present a very serious topic through the use of graphical analogies in representing concepts and scientific variables.  These graphical analogies can be characterized as immersive, abstract, and fluid impressions that attempt to convey useful information.  In addition, questions and answers are utilized but the Application section of the App is intended to evaluate understanding.  The App first defines cancer in an experimental context and the Application part of the App goes more in-depth into applying knowledge. 

Ultimately, this App has two primary goals: evaluate whether users are interested in the concept of (using explicit abstraction to present science) and whether this style of presentation is productive for learning/understanding.   It goes from easy to moderately complex experimental topics.  As an aspiring STEM educator who trained in biomedical research, please feel free to give your comments.  

Additional Features that will be added pending interest:

1.  TensorFlow Driven intuitive Response

2.  (More topics)

3.  Use of abstraction with music (Jazz) in rendering modeling-(backdrop sets may include Green Chimneys or Take 5)

title: Puzzle games toddlers + kids
description:
*** Fun educational game for toddlers of age 1.5 and up 
*** English voice over – Learn first words
*** Developed with certified child psychologists 
***10 beautiful mini-game boards 

About the game: 
---------------------- 
TinyHands First Words 2 is an educational game for children of age 1.5 and up, the second game in our First Words series.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as clothes, seasons, body parts and more.

The game is designed to enhance the following: 
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Concentration 
- Categorization 
- Visual perception 
- Vocabulary 

Game Boards: 
-------------------- 
The game consists of 10 beautiful boards organized in a book like structure with big colourful buttons. This unique structure allows the toddler to easily navigate between the different boards and play independently. The boards were CAREFULLY CHOSEN in order to represent basic concepts from the child's world. 

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team: 
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.

title: Baden-Powell Game
description:
Test your knowledge about Baden-Powell's life - the Founder of the Scout Movement - and about the History of Scouting. Play this multiple choice game with 400 questions and earn medals and merit badges. 
Questions available cover six areas: military life, family, personal, scouting, Brownsea and books. You have limited time to answer each question.
Be careful with the percentage of correct answers as it gives way to earn some of the medals.

title: Purple Pink Hat Creator
description:
It’s time to be creative! Design a nice hat for your Papo friends! Make it whatever you like! 
Learn through play, improve hand-eye coordination and develop creativity!

The Papo forest friends come into your hat shop! Shake your device or simply click them to switch characters.

There are funny hat shapes for your choices! You may choose ordinary shapes like a panama hat or a jazz hat, also unusual shapes such as a flowerpot, a guitar, or an umbrella!

Next! Choose your favorite fabrics and decorations from a wide range of colors and patterns. Make creative combinations of your own! The best part is that you could take pictures of items in real life and use it as decorations on your hat.

The most surprising part is the magical carrot wand! Wave the magic wand and cast funny animations on the hat! It might grow a mysterious plant, become a guitar playing beautiful songs, or a gift box with a surprise? Waiting for you to discover!

Finally take a photo with your hat creation! Remember to share this fun game with your friends!  

【Features】
	Designed for children!
	24 colors and patterns available, real life pictures could be used as patterns!
	Take photos with hat creation!
	No rules, more fun!
	Explore creativity and imagination
	Look for delightful surprises and discover hidden tricks!
	No Wi-Fi needed. It can be played anywhere!
	Non third party advertising.

This version of Papo World Hat Creator is free to download. Unlock more rooms through in-app purchase. Once complete the purchase, it will be permanently unlocked and bound with your account. 
If there are any questions during the purchase and playing, feel free to contact us via contact@papoworld.com


[About Papo World]
Papo World aims to create a relaxed, harmonious and enjoyable game play environment to stimulate children's curiosity and interest in learning. 
Focused on games and supplemented by fun animated episodes, our preschool digital educational products are tailored for children. 
Through experiential and immersive gameplay, kids could develop healthy living habits and arise curiosity and creativity. Discover and inspire talents of every child!

【contact us】
Mailbox: contact@papoworld.com
website:www.popaworld.com
Face book: https://www.facebook.com/PapoWorld/

title: Bibi.Pet Jungle: Learning Games for Toddler
description:
Where is this sound of drums coming from? Listen hard. Can you hear it?
Tum, tum, Tum tum!
Yes. It’s coming from the Bibi.Pet Jungle!

Our new fun friends are again taking us on an exploration of their curious world...
Are you brave enough to play and learn in the jungle?

Fish eagles, rhinoceroses and, most of all, lots of fun await us in the search for hidden treasures and daring escapes among the trees of the forest!
The adventures never end. Come and explore the fantastic world of Bibi.Pet!

The funny little animals that live there have particular shapes and speak their own special language: the Bibi’s language, which only children can understand.
Bibi.Pet are cute, friendly and scatterbrained, and can’t wait to play with all the family!

You can learn and have fun with them with colors, shapes, puzzles and logic games.

Features:

- Learn to draw with lines
- Sort objects
- Use logic
- Complete puzzles
- Educational games for children for ages 2 and up
- Lots of different games for learning while having fun


--- DESIGNED FOR LITTLE ONES --- 
 
- Absolutely no adverts 
- Designed to entertain children aged from 2 to 6, from little to big!
- Games with SIMPLE rules for children to play alone or with their parents. 
- Perfect for children at play school. 
- A host of entertaining sounds and interactive animation. 
- No need for reading skills, perfect also for pre-school or nursery children. 
- Characters created for boys and girls. 

--- DRAW WITH LINES ---

Learning to coordinate the hand, tracing a line, is the first important step towards drawing and writing. With our games, children manage to hone this ability in an amusing and natural way, developing their dexterity.

--- SORTING ---

Putting in order is preparatory training for recognizing the size of an object and its relationship with other elements. It is, therefore, fundamental for preparing the mind for comparing different sizes and for understanding our surroundings.

--- Bibi.Pet Who are we? --- 
 
We produce games for our children, and it is our passion. We produce tailor-made games, without invasive advertising by third parties. 
Some of our games have free trial versions, which means you can try them out first before purchases, supporting our team and enabling us to develop new games and keep all our apps up-to-date. 

We create a variety of games based on: colours and shapes, dressing up, dinosaur games for boys, games for girls, mini-games for smaller children and many other fun and educational games; you can try them all! 

Our thanks to all the families who show their trust in Bibi.Pet!

title: Jesus para as crianças - OFICIAL
description:
• HISTÓRIAS BÍBLICAS
Além das crianças assistirem às histórias dos grandes acontecimentos bíblicos, o educador tirará proveito de seu roteiro para interagir com as crianças e explorar os pontos fortes, incentivando-as a meditarem sobre esses pontos e a aplicá-los no seu dia a dia.

• BIBLEQUEST
Desafio bíblico interativo, brincadeira de perguntas e respostas relativas à história bíblica: um passatempo educativo que nos ajuda a criar o perfil da criança.

• SUPER EDUCATIVO
Desafio interativo, com perguntas que reforçam o aprendizado escolar e que assim como no "BIBLEQUEST" oferecem a oportunidade de interação entre o educador e as crianças.

• JOGOS BÍBLICOS
Toda criança se sente atraída por joguinhos, eles são o passatempo preferido delas. Com design moderno e atrativo e com dinâmicas interessantes nos utilizamos desta forma de entretenimento para ajudar a criança a memorizar intuitivamente partes importantes de cada história, enquanto ela se diverte.

• VOCAÇÃO ESPIRITUAL
Um maravilhoso e edificante passatempo que contém 15 perguntas, pelas quais a criança para respondê-las faz uma atividade interativa e assim, ela nem se dará conta de que responderá perguntas superimportantes que estarão contribuindo para a formação do seu caráter.

• BOLETIM ONLINE
As respostas coletadas através do painel e aplicativo são registradas no boletim online. Isso permite que por avaliações sejam detectadas as áreas espirituais em que a criança precisa de mais amparo ou em que área ela se destaque. Em poder dessas informações, seja possível fortalecer as áreas fracas e potencializar ainda mais aquelas em que a criança já seja forte.

Como as crianças saberão que serão monitoradas pelos pais, pois elas serão informadas que suas respostas irão para o histórico de seu boletim no SISTEMA DE AVALIAÇÃO, aos quais os pais terão acesso, elas se esforçarão para responder corretamente. Assim, o objetivo de se conseguir resultados positivos no aprendizado da Palavra de Deus, será alcançado.

Jogos, bíblicos, educacionais, educativos, cristão, atividades bíblicas, 
historias bíblicas, passatempo bíblico, entretenimento edificante, ensino cristão, bíblico, interativo, católicos, adventistas, batista, presbiteriano, assembleia de Deus, criança, menino, menina, 2 anos, 3 anos, 4 anos, 5 anos, 6 anos, 7 anos, 8 anos, 9 anos, sistema, boletim, online, games, bíblia, quebra-cabeça, jesus, Deus, sistema, educação, espiritual, infantil.

title: Omicroid
description: Omicroids are tiny alien organisms that came to Earth on an asteroid. They're new to this planet, so we don't know much about them. It's up to you to discover what it takes to keep each species happy. Create experiments, manipulate variables, collect data, and form conclusions based on your findings.

It's up to you to discover what it takes to keep each species happy. Create experiments, manipulate variables, collect data, and form conclusions based on your findings.
summary: Conduct experiments with microscopic aliens!

title: Fashion Coloring Book & Drawing Book For Kids
description:
With the Fashion  Coloring Book & Drawing Book For Kids app, you can color the Fashion images and relax while you do it. It has background music and sound effects, and many other amazing features which is very suitable for children.

Including a variety of Fashion. You can both develop the sense of color and relax yourself. It can be played anytime, anywhere, easily share to social platforms.

Sharing on social networks is a must nowadays, and Fashion Drawing Book lets you do it easily. Fb, Twit, and Insta are the best fit in this case.

If you want your children to learn sense about colors and drawing then this app is for them!
 Features: ★ Select a drawing template for coloring
★ Use the color of pencil you like
★ Color the drawing, by tapping and dragging on each gap of the drawing
★ You can also color outside of the drawing to make apply color to background you like
★ Different styles of colors to increase real coloring experience 
★ Change the size of pencil you want makes coloring more pleasant
★ Eraser tool to erase the unwanted color
★ You can share, store your artwork

● Support. 
We work hard to keep Fashion Coloring Book   running on all available Android devices. If your run into any issues please send us an email so we can try to solve it for you and other players.

● Age rating
Fashion Coloring Book  is a free game for all ages. Children, girls, and adults can enjoy it without any restrictions. Have your kids pass time with this app.

Download today and start your coloring book relaxing therapy, you won't regret it!

title: Toddo Land
description:
Welcome to Toddo Land – the tropical play paradise for children aged two to five.

Immerse yourself in a fabulous world and meet the friendly islanders as you join your child on five different adventures.

Each game is fun, entertaining and, last but not least, promotes your child’s different abilities and skills:

Reactivity in the Balloon Game – Balloons in all colors and sizes rise up to the sky, raining confetti and glitter dust if tapped in time.
Logical thinking in the Cat Game – More and more kittens must be stacked so that they reach the ever higher rising star.
Coordination in the Butterfly Game – Help the hard-working butterfly flying from rainbow to rainbow to make the flowers grow, but watch out for the thunderclouds.
Creativity in the Hedgehog Game – A tiny hungry hedgehog rolls back and forth in the forest looking for its favorite fruits. 
Exploratory spirit in the Jungle Game – Curious giraffes, cheeky monkeys and nimble beetles; the jungle is full of secrets just waiting to be discovered.

Toddo Lands fantasy world was developed according to children's wishes and captivates with its lovingly animated characters and colorful landscapes.

Each game is easy to play and has no language at all. Fun sound effects and harmonious background music by bensound.com complete the gaming experience.

Toddo Land is free, has no in-game purchases and no ads. The game is suitable for both girls and boys.

If you have any questions, need support or would like to make a suggestion, please contact us: 
hello@dreipol.ch 

Have fun discovering!

title: Yes! Our Kids Can - 1st Grade
description:
Yes! Our Kids Can is an innovative, bilingual digital learning platform containing fun, culturally-relevant games, videos, music and activities geared to instill a Success Mindset™ in the minds of young children and their families. 

A Success Mindset™ includes:
-College and career readiness
-Growth mindset and self efficacy
-Social and emotional learning
-Academic skills required to succeed

When used together with YOKC In-Class 15 Minute-a-Day Teacher Curriculum and Family Engagement programs, research indicates the program is a contributing factor to keep students from:
-Falling behind in school
-Making low grades
-Testing poorly
-Becoming discouraged
-Dropping out of school
-Perpetuating the cycle of poverty

The Yes! Our Kids Can program creates higher educational expectations in families, greater family engagement in school and intrinsically motivated, higher-performing students. 

If you are interested in implementing this program in your school contact us at john@ourkidscan.org.

title: Control Aide
description:
Control Aide is made for both emerging orienteers and long time veterans with the intention to make reading control descriptions like second nature. It aims to achieve this through repetition but also has a useful index to look up any symbol.

It has features such as: 
• Four different quizzes to help teach control description symbols and their meanings.
•  A helpful index of all control description symbols.

Contact: Wellington Orienteering Club

Keywords: Descriptions, Control, Description, Symbols, Learn, Orienteers, Orienteering, Wellington, Educational.

Have fun making animals dance and roar while learning!

title: KBC 2018
description:
About Game
KBC 2018 is a game to improve your General Knowledge & enhance your IQ.
This is a very famous game format now a days for all the MCQs.
You will improve your  General knowledge, Current affairs quiz, English learning quiz and quiz from the subjects like history, biology, geography, physics, chemistry ,mathematics and reasoning etc…
So basically this is the best package to improve your General Knowledge.
	
How to Play ?
★ You need to select target first to set your minimum goal.
Till you reach your target ,you need to give answer within 45 seconds.
Than you have endless time for your answer.
★ Total 15 questions.
★ 4 Life line.
	★ Flip the questions
	★  Audience Pall
	★  50 - 50
	★  Double dip
★ You can use any of the life line one’s.
★ If you are not sure about answer you can quit too.
★ Left side of play area you can see where you reach in hidden panel 

	
Who can play ?
	All who can improve GK or Check own knowledge.

Game Features
•Realistic graphics and ambient sound.
•Realistic 2D stunning and amazing animations.
•Smooth and simple controls.
•User friendly interface and interactive graphics.
• General Knowledge Questions till 2018.

Benefits
★ Thousands of general knowledge questions, the further you go the harder these questions get.
★ Offline play possibility
★ With bright graphics, the interface is clear and convenient.
★This game will be very useful for the people who are preparing for the competitive challenging exams like bank exams, PO, Clark, IPS, IAS, UPSC preparation, SSC preparation, and all kind of other exams preparations.

title: Learning games: toddlers, kids
description:
### Christmas special edition ###

*** Fun educational Christmas Spirit game for toddlers of age 3 and up
*** SORT AND MATCH by shape, color, orientation, symmetry and much more
*** Developed with certified child psychologists
*** 8 beautiful mini-games 

About the game:
-----------------
"Toy Factory" is an engaging educational game for children of age 3 and up.   
Join Santa’s Christmas preparations in his magical Toy Factory up in the sky. While helping Santa build smart and fun gifts, your child will practice and advance VISUAL PERCEPTION concepts such as size, length, colors, orientation, symmetry, shapes and more. Experiencing Santa’s fun factory assembly line, gives your child the opportunity to acquire higher skills such as TASK PERSISTENCE and FOLLOWING STEPS.

The game is designed to enhance the following skills:
- Sequencing
- Sorting
- Matching 
- Visual perception
- Attention
- Task persistence
- Hand-eye coordination

Game Boards:
------------
The game consists of 8 engaging boards ordered in an ascending level of difficulty. The boards were CAREFULLY CHOSEN in order to practice and advance visual perception concepts, which promotes a solid foundation for recognising numbers and letters later on.
 
Castle: Matching Geometric SHAPES.
Engine and Spaceship: Sequencing parts by LENGTH.
Hot-Air Balloon: Sorting COLORS by HUE.
Robot and Dinosaur: Sorting SHAPES.
Pirate ship: Sequencing parts by SIZE.
Airplane: Matching objects by ORIENTATION.

TinyHands Games:
------------
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon Tree House
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

title: LetterSchool Complete
description:
LetterSchool Complete. Good and Complete Education Game

LetterSchool Complete is a perfect Education Learning app for your kids who sit at kindergarten or preschool. 

LetterSchool Complete could be a pain for kids below 2 - 3 years, however, with this app, it would be really really fun! 

Complete with cute sounds, cute pictures, and high recording of letters and words, kids and parents will enjoy to use this app to teach kids English.

This application is also for kids around the world, and will be distributed around the world. It would be a perfect app to make your kids fluent with English!

6 Features you will find when using this app:

✔ Reading - Your kids will learn how to spell and pronounce the first letter of animals from A to Z. It would keep your baby laughing because it comes with cute pictures and cute sounds! 
Like for example, G for Giraffe Not only your baby will be good at spelling the letter, he/she will know what the name of the animal is.

✔ Writing - Your kids will learn how to write the letters. 
There will be a green board like on the class, and dotted lines that kids have to follow to write the letters from A to Z. 
Writing along dotted lines is definitely fun for kids!

✔ Pattern Connecting Dots - Connect alphabetic dots to see the images. 
It will contain 10 high-quality images that will keep your kids laughing. 
The alphabet will be in sequence with random starting alphabet.

✔ Pattern Sequence - Kids need to be able to drag alphabets to make the right sequence. 
Kids will be given 5 random Sequence to start with.

✔ Find the Correct Image - Kids are asked to choose which item among 3 items that its first letter is the same as the given letter. 
As for example, given letter A, and there are 3 items: bus, cat, and jar. If kids click the bus item, it will be correct, otherwise it will be wrong!

✔ Puzzle - Shows colourful letter pieces and asks kid to place these pieces on right place which make up the shape of the letter. 
Use attractive graphics and sounds for result.

✔ Quiz - This activity contains draggable letters which needs to be arranged to construct full words. 
There are images and sounds associated with each word and letter. 
It improves vocabulary of child. Use nice graphics and sounds for result.

There will be cute graphics from Antelope to Zebra! Cute Sounds! Kids will definitely love it! Download Now FREE

title: Math Shelf: Early Math Mastery
description:
Math Shelf is a preK to 1st grade tablet mathematics program that includes over 800 games, activities and puzzles that engage children throughout the school year.

**** Common Core Aligned *****
Math Shelf's content exceeds the First Grade Common Core Standards.

**** On Level Instruction for Every Student ****
Placement tests and adaptive learning provide on level instruction for every student in your class.

**** Cloud Based *****

title: Child's Basic teaching  App
description:
Children basic teaching app is not just fun app for your children. They may not be just playing with it they will be learning through it as well. This app provides almost all the basic teaching which is required on ground level.
The key feature of this app is to teach some commonly seen animals, colors, basic geometrical shapes, alphabets, numbers, musical instruments, fruits, vehicles and some communication devices.
 This app also provides identical shapes for the characters and entities being used for identification with their name pronunciation and spelling. Your children will start identifying the things which are being used in this app. For strengthening child's knowledge and identification ask your child to identify and pronounce the things your child has seen in this app. Its not just for strengthening the knowledge it will also help in building up his interest in learning and implementing new things.

title: CBRC LETVENTURES MOBILE APP GAME
description:
Dr. Carl E. Balita Review Center (CBRC), the biggest and the leading brand in test preparation proudly presents and offers its most innovative, comprehensive, and interactive ACADEMIC GAME that aims to test players’ profound background knowledge on concepts and principles in the different subjects covered in the Philippine Licensure Examination for Teachers (LET). Specifically, it challenges players to exert time and effort in choosing the best answers in the questions given for each level in order to succeed and finally get a virtual license as a proof of achieving excellence towards the culmination of the game. 

AVAILABLE IN FULL VERSION: 

There are five (5) levels with corresponding CBRC ICON to beat and examination coverage to overcome: LEVEL 1 is designed to let players accurately answer General Education questions in order to outwit the Gen Ed Royalty, Ms. Vanessa Joy P. Gasat known as “The Sorcerer”; LEVEL 2 is filled with Professional Education concepts that players need to be familiarized with so that The Dean of Review, Amb. Janus de Leon, The Wizard in the game can be defeated; LEVEL 3 also features General Education questions that are all necessary to be aced by players to outsmart the Viral Topnotcher, Ms. Iah B. Seraspi popularly called The Witch in this game; LEVEL 4 is quite complex for players must absolutely know all the correct answers to

title: Pollywog Pond - Home Edition
description:
Pollywog Pond is a fun place where Kids can make new friends while exploring a world filled with hopes, dreams and discoveries. Located halfway between Here and There, the setting is natural, colorful and inviting. Playing as a Doodle, students can play and interact with the characters Derb, Berb Waddle and Weep. Students will play games featuring our Pond friends, watch music videos, subject videos, read our storybooks, search mazes and more. There are hours of fun! New content will be added every month.

Pollywog Pond is a fun video game portal to music, reading, videos, games and more. With an underlying soft-curriculum, the game portal emphasizes problem solving, social and emotional literacy and teamwork. Pollywog Pond is single-player game. 


We recommend that players utilize the "Game Tips"  and the "FAQ" pages of our web site, www.PollywogPond.com, to become familiar with all that the game portal has to offer for students. The Home Edition for PC and Mac is also available from our web site.

Come join the fun!

Please note:
For your child's safety, registration is required on our website, including parental approval for 13 and under. After downloading the game, go to our site and click on the"New Player" button to create a Doodle player,  create a user name and password:
https//www.PollywogPond.com  

It's easy, it's free!

title: Hapan Sellam - Play & Learn
description:
ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය ඩිජිටල් අධ්‍යාපන ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ නැවුම් වෙනසක් ඇති කළ, පුරෝගාමී ළමා අධ්‍යාපන මෘදුකාංග එකතුව “හපන්” වෙතින් ළමා ලොවට තිළිණ කරන නවතම නිපැයුමයි, හපන් සෙල්ලම්.

ඔබේ පුංචි සිඟිත්තාගේ තාර්කික හැකියාවන් වැඩි දියුණු කරවමින්, වර්ණ හා හැඩතල පිළිබඳව හොඳ හුරුවක් ලබා දෙන අධ්‍යාපනික මෘදුකාංගයක් විදියට හපන් සෙල්ලම් හඳුන්වා දෙන්න පුළුවන්. හැඩතල හඳුනාගැනීම හා හැසිරවීම, කුඩා හැඩයන් එක්කර තනි රූපයක් සෑදීම, ජිග්සෝ ප්‍රහේලිකා විසඳීම වැනි ක්‍රියාකාරකම් මෙහි ඇතුළත් වෙනවා.

දරුවාගේ අධ්‍යාපනය ගැන සැලකිලිමත් වෙමින්, නමුත් දරුවාට දැනුම සමග විනෝදය ලැබෙන ආකාරයෙන් හපන් සෙල්ලම් නිර්මාණය කර තිබීම විශේෂත්වයක් වෙනවා. දරුවන් වෙනුවෙන්ම නිර්මාණය වී ඇති රූප, ශබ්ද හා ක්‍රියාකාරකම් සමගින් එන හපන් සෙල්ලම්, කුඩා දරුවන්ගේ බුද්ධි වර්ධනයට ලබාදෙන පිටුවහළ ඉතා ඉහළයි.

හපන් සෙල්ලම් “රූප හදමු” හා “ජිග්සෝ රූප” ලෙසින් අදියර දෙකකින් සමන්විතයි. පොඩිත්තන් ආසම කරන විදියට සුරතල් සත්ත්ව රූප ලෙසින් නිමවා ඇති ක්‍රියාකාරකම් 16 ක් එක් එක් පාඩම තුළ අඩංගුයි.

රූප හදමු - දී ඇති රූපය කොටස් වලට වෙන් කර තිබේ. දරුවා විසින් කොටස් එකතු කර පින්තූරය සම්පූර්ණ කළ යුතුයි. 

ජිග්සෝ රූප - ජිග්සෝ ප්‍රහේලිකා ආකාරයෙන් පින්තූරය ගොඩ නැඟිය යුතුයි.

විශේෂාංග:
* සිඟිත්තන්ගේ පුංචි ඇඟිලි පොඩිවලට ලෙහෙසියෙන් හසුරුවන්නට හැකියි.
* පොඩ්ඩන්ගේ හිත ඇදගන්නා වර්ණවත් රූප හා උද්යෝගීමත් සංගීත ඛණ්ඩයන්.
* පුංචි සිඟිත්තාගේ සිට පෙරපාසැල් දරුවන් දක්වා සැමට සුදුසුයි. (අවුරුදු 2 - 5)
* සැකසුම් භාවිත කර, රූප සැකසීම ක්‍රම ක්‍රමයෙන් අභියෝගාත්මක කළ හැකියි.
* දෙමව්පිය ඔබට වුවත් ක්‍රීඩා කළ හැකියි.
* එක් එක් පාඩම තුළ පින්තූර 16 බැගින් ඇතුළත් කර ඇත. 
* කුඩා දරුවන් තුළ ඒකාග්‍රතාවය හා නුවණ වර්ධනය කරවමින්, දරුවා අභියෝගයන්ට පුහුණු කරවයි.

හපන් සෙල්ලම්  ක්‍රම දෙකකට Active කරගන්න පුළුවන්.
1. Dilalog අංකයෙන්
2. Credit/Debit Card පත් මගින්

Dialog අංකයෙන් සක්‍රිය කර ගැනීමේදී ඔබ සිදු කලයුත්තේ ගෙවීම සිදුකිරීමට බලාපොරොත්තුවන අංකය හපන් සෙල්ලම් App එකේ ඇතුලත් කිරීමයි. ඉන්පසු එම අංකයට SMS මගින් ඉලක්කම් 6ක PIN අංකයක් ලැබේවි. එය නැවත හපන් සෙල්ලම් APP එකේ ඇතුලත් කරන්න.

** කිසිදු මාසික හෝ දෛනික ගාස්තුවක් නොමැත, අදාල පැකේජයේ ගාස්තුව අයවන්නේ එක්වරක් පමණි.

වර්තමානයේ දරුවන් තාක්‍ෂණය සමග ඉතාමත් ඉක්මණින් එකතු වෙන නිසා හපන් මගින් අපේ අරමුණ දරුවන්ට වැදගත් සහ උචිත දේ තාක්ෂණය භාවිතයෙන්ම ලබා දීමයි.

වැඩි විස්තර සඳහා අපව අමතන්න 034 2040600 හෝ 076 6137006
අපගේ Facebook පිටුව, https://www.facebook.com/hapan.lk
descriptionHTML:
ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය ඩිජිටල් අධ්‍යාපන ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ නැවුම් වෙනසක් ඇති කළ, පුරෝගාමී ළමා අධ්‍යාපන මෘදුකාංග එකතුව “හපන්” වෙතින් ළමා ලොවට තිළිණ කරන නවතම නිපැයුමයි, හපන් සෙල්ලම්.

ඔබේ පුංචි සිඟිත්තාගේ තාර්කික හැකියාවන් වැඩි දියුණු කරවමින්, වර්ණ හා හැඩතල පිළිබඳව හොඳ හුරුවක් ලබා දෙන අධ්‍යාපනික මෘදුකාංගයක් විදියට හපන් සෙල්ලම් හඳුන්වා දෙන්න පුළුවන්. හැඩතල හඳුනාගැනීම හා හැසිරවීම, කුඩා හැඩයන් එක්කර තනි රූපයක් සෑදීම, ජිග්සෝ ප්‍රහේලිකා විසඳීම වැනි ක්‍රියාකාරකම් මෙහි ඇතුළත් වෙනවා.

දරුවාගේ අධ්‍යාපනය ගැන සැලකිලිමත් වෙමින්, නමුත් දරුවාට දැනුම සමග විනෝදය ලැබෙන ආකාරයෙන් හපන් සෙල්ලම් නිර්මාණය කර තිබීම විශේෂත්වයක් වෙනවා. දරුවන් වෙනුවෙන්ම නිර්මාණය වී ඇති රූප, ශබ්ද හා ක්‍රියාකාරකම් සමගින් එන හපන් සෙල්ලම්, කුඩා දරුවන්ගේ බුද්ධි වර්ධනයට ලබාදෙන පිටුවහළ ඉතා ඉහළයි.

හපන් සෙල්ලම් “රූප හදමු” හා “ජිග්සෝ රූප” ලෙසින් අදියර දෙකකින් සමන්විතයි. පොඩිත්තන් ආසම කරන විදියට සුරතල් සත්ත්ව රූප ලෙසින් නිමවා ඇති ක්‍රියාකාරකම් 16 ක් එක් එක් පාඩම තුළ අඩංගුයි.

රූප හදමු - දී ඇති රූපය කොටස් වලට වෙන් කර තිබේ. දරුවා විසින් කොටස් එකතු කර පින්තූරය සම්පූර්ණ කළ යුතුයි.

ජිග්සෝ රූප - ජිග්සෝ ප්‍රහේලිකා ආකාරයෙන් පින්තූරය ගොඩ නැඟිය යුතුයි.

විශේෂාංග:
* සිඟිත්තන්ගේ පුංචි ඇඟිලි පොඩිවලට ලෙහෙසියෙන් හසුරුවන්නට හැකියි.
* පොඩ්ඩන්ගේ හිත ඇදගන්නා වර්ණවත් රූප හා උද්යෝගීමත් සංගීත ඛණ්ඩයන්.
* පුංචි සිඟිත්තාගේ සිට පෙරපාසැල් දරුවන් දක්වා සැමට සුදුසුයි. (අවුරුදු 2 - 5)
* සැකසුම් භාවිත කර, රූප සැකසීම ක්‍රම ක්‍රමයෙන් අභියෝගාත්මක කළ හැකියි.
* දෙමව්පිය ඔබට වුවත් ක්‍රීඩා කළ හැකියි.
* එක් එක් පාඩම තුළ පින්තූර 16 බැගින් ඇතුළත් කර ඇත.
* කුඩා දරුවන් තුළ ඒකාග්‍රතාවය හා නුවණ වර්ධනය කරවමින්, දරුවා අභියෝගයන්ට පුහුණු කරවයි.

හපන් සෙල්ලම් ක්‍රම දෙකකට Active කරගන්න පුළුවන්.
1. Dilalog අංකයෙන්
2. Credit/Debit Card පත් මගින්

Dialog අංකයෙන් සක්‍රිය කර ගැනීමේදී ඔබ සිදු කලයුත්තේ ගෙවීම සිදුකිරීමට බලාපොරොත්තුවන අංකය හපන් සෙල්ලම් App එකේ ඇතුලත් කිරීමයි. ඉන්පසු එම අංකයට SMS මගින් ඉලක්කම් 6ක PIN අංකයක් ලැබේවි. එය නැවත හපන් සෙල්ලම් APP එකේ ඇතුලත් කරන්න.

** කිසිදු මාසික හෝ දෛනික ගාස්තුවක් නොමැත, අදාල පැකේජයේ ගාස්තුව අයවන්නේ එක්වරක් පමණි.

වර්තමානයේ දරුවන් තාක්‍ෂණය සමග ඉතාමත් ඉක්මණින් එකතු වෙන නිසා හපන් මගින් අපේ අරමුණ දරුවන්ට වැදගත් සහ උචිත දේ තාක්ෂණය භාවිතයෙන්ම ලබා දීමයි.

වැඩි විස්තර සඳහා අපව අමතන්න 034 2040600 හෝ 076 6137006
අපගේ Facebook පිටුව, https://www.facebook.com/hapan.lk
summary: අකුරු ලියලා මහන්සි පොඩ්ඩන්ට

title: Joy School English
description:
Joy School was founded on five proven English-learning principles:

- Curriculum design that tightly integrates the language domains
- Design based on research—digital and EFL learning
- Core values interwoven throughout (courage, honesty, grit, responsibility, kindness, 
   empathy, self-discipline, positivity)
- Emphasis on oral language
- Irresistible engagement

title: English Listening Master - Learn Dictation
description:
English Listening Master will help you understand English better, improve your English language skills and help you learn real English spoken in everyday situations. 

English Listening Master is the first application of its kind to make a game out of improving your English listening skills through dictation using real English conversations in a fun, enjoyable and educational way.

Learn real English and practice your English listening skills by typing the letters of the words you hear or tapping the words of the audio to form the sentences. 

English Listening Master is a fun and educational game for kids, seniors and English language students of all ages who want to learn English and improve their listening skills in a more entertaining way.

Perfect classroom audio listening recordings don't prepare you for listening in the real world. 

English Listening Master uses audio from thousands of different native speakers in real settings complete with background noise to make the task more realistic, more practical, and more effective.

How do you play?

It’s easy. Listen to the audio, and tap or type the words you hear to form the correct sentence.

With this entertaining dictation game, you will learn English and practice listening in a fun way. 

With three modes of difficulty to write the sentences and four levels of sentence difficulty, Listening Master is great for everyone from the elementary level right up to the most seasoned and skilled English ears.

What options are there to write what you hear?

Don’t worry, you can choose between three options depending on how much help you need. 

In Easy mode, you have the words written for you on the screen and you just have to tap the words you hear in the correct order.

In Competent mode, you will only have the letters of the words, and you have to spell out each word you hear by typing the letters in the correct order.

In Expert mode, you won’t have any help, and you will have to put your listening skills to the maximum test.

Which one will you choose?

The Levels:English Listening Master has four levels: Beginner, Competent, Professional, and Expert

Beginner: Ideal for children. This level contains the easiest sentences with the fewest words to tap or spell.

Competent: This is where things start to get harder. This level is great for students who are beginning their English language learning adventure.

Professional: Great for students with a solid base in English who want to keep their skills up to date.

Expert: Only for those with the most proficient English skills. Are you one of them?

Do you have what it takes to become the next Listening Master?

With Listening Master you'll improve your real English listening and conversation skills while you play and have fun testing your English. 

With single player and multiplayer mode, you can practice alone, challenge your friends or classmates as well as challenge other players from around the globe.

Who's got the best ear for English in the class, family or among your friends?  Learn English with a smile on your face with English Listening Master

title: School Clues (Tanda Aral)
description:
Hey there! Need some help to teach your kids the basic Filipino Language? 

This application will teach your kids about the basics of the main subjects; Math (Sipnayan), Science (Agham), Art (Sining) and Language (Wika). After each lesson per subject there are simple activities that the kids would be doing for them to have a record of their progress along the way. 

The application is limited to the use of kids from Nursery-Kindergarten within the age 3-5 years old and their parents or teachers. It is limited to lessons and activities only and is also limited to Filipino users since the language is only Tagalog as of now, as the developer of this app focused on the mother-tongue language of the kids in accordance to the K-12 educational System of the Philippines.

title: Fimo Fox Adventures Kids Games
description:
Educational toddler games for pre-kindergarten kids. Our app has 6 pre-k activities for toddlers that will help your baby develop basic skills like hand eye coordination, fine motor, logical thinking and visual perception. These games will suit both girls and boys and can be a part of pre-kindergarten & preschool education for kids. 

How to Reinforce Your Child’s Learning

Fimo Fox Adventures Kids Games was developed as a tool for parents eager to help their children learn new skills while playing in order to develop new skills for kinder including Math Games. Multiple studies show that the quickest and most effective way to learn new abilities is through hands-on play. Different educational games systems including Montessori and Waldorf will agree that play and imagination are a fundamental part of the learning process. As a mother, I understand that our kids imitate our example. Even though we would like to sometimes isolate them from technology, it's nearly impossible when we spend many hours a day in front of a computer or mobile devices. It is for this reason that instead of avoiding the elephant in the room, my husband and I developed games that will work as a learning tool that will stimulate our children's curiosity. Perfect for Montessori Preschool Educational Games and Montessori Education

Develop New Skills

Fimo Fox Adventures Kids Games is a great place for kids to play while being constantly challenged to learn new skills for kinder with educational games. Kids  need variety while training their new skills. These kids games offer exactly that. We have tested all our kids games with our son and he absolutely loves them! This gives us confidence that your kids will also love these entertaining and mind challenging puzzles. 

◆  6 Educational Games that range from reading and spelling to drawing and shape recognition.

◆  Shapes: A drawing tool to introduce children to basic shapes: Circle; rectangle; Square and triangle.

◆  An introduction to shapes recognition and sorting of the following shapes: rectangle, pentagon, circle; oval; diamond; hexagon and square.

◆  A shapes sorting game to help hand eye coordination while emphasizing the learning of shapes: rectangle, pentagon, circle; oval; diamond; hexagon and square.

◆  Preschool Learning Educational Games for toddlers in order to develop new skills.

◆  Ages: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 year old.

◆  Fimo Fox Adventures Kids Games
◆  Education for Kindergarten Kids
◆  1st Grade Learning Games
◆  2nd Grade Learning Games
◆  3rd Grade Learning Games
◆ Educational Games. 

We're always excited to hear from you so if you have any feedback on how we can make this the best Preschool Game in town please send us an email!

We respect that parents may make different choices about technology for their families. We strongly encourage parents to discuss technology expectations with other families. 

Familiarize yourself with the safety and privacy settings of this or any educational games from our store.

Toddler games are perfect for pre-k and kindergarten children who want to learn by playing. 

Ages: 2, 3, 4 or 5 years old pre-kindergarten and kindergarten children.

We encourage to use a parental control tool to help you monitor and limit your child’s online activity, on all devices. However, be cautious: no tool provides perfect protection. Nothing can replace your personal attention and monitoring.

title: Little Baby Rhymes Videos & Kids Poem Songs
description:
Nursery baby rhymes are tended to help kids learning and development. Let your little baby tap their feet and clap their hands as they listen to these soothing and amazing Little Baby Rhymes Videos & Kids Poem Songs. Fill kids land with interactive baby songs and kids top rhymes as the baby music poems play along. Sing with your kids and have the best time with your toddler.

Little Baby Rhymes Videos & Kids Poem Songs has baby bumm children songs with best rhymes flourishing learning. There are many nursery babies rhymes video. 🎵  Row, Row, Row Your Boat
🎵  Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
🎵  Ring-A-Ring O'Roses

title: Art Stories Wonders
description:
Travel around the world: there are so many places to discover!
You will fly over Easter Island with its Moai, reach the peak of Machu Picchu on a llamaback, visit the Golden Palace in Kyoto with its blooming cherries, help cleaning the Great Barrier Reef, try and build the Tour Eiffel in Paris and the Statue of Liberty in New York.
After having run along the Great Chinese Wall, you will celebrate the solstice in Stonehenge, meet gladiators in the Colosseum in Rome, play a pelota game in Chichen Itza, decorate the Taj Mahal; you will attend the camel market in Petra, after having admired the migration in Serengeti… a breathtaking adventure to splendid places, known for their history or for their natural beauty.

We designed the game as a springboard for future explorations: kids approach distant places and different eras and – thanks to the short info – they understand the value of all sites: they learn by playing, with no effort. Get ready to pack your bags for a real journey!

The app is built with original illustrations and a large selection of visual materials from Europeana Collections.

Art Stories WONDERS is part of the series Art Stories 4 FUN: a library of digital tools to engage children in art, architecture and history. 
Both kids and grown-ups - be it teachers or parents - can play together with Art Stories apps and enjoy off-line activities, to keep on learning and having fun. Would like to know more? Send an email to info@artstories.it

Privacy:
We do not collect non share personal info about you or you child, and we do not allow third-parties advertising. To learn more about our privacy policy, visit our website www.artstories.it 

Who are we:
Art Stories is a digital publisher; we develop educational games on cultural heritage, addressing children aged 5 to 10.
We have a strong background in museum educatio and we believe digital tools enhance curiosity and empower competences.
Playing with cities, art and history is a splendid adventure for creative children all over the world. Our apps encourage exploration off-line, to discover the world!

Learn more on:
Website: www.artstories.it
FB: https://www.facebook.com/ArtStoriesItaly/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/artstoriesitaly
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/artstoriesitaly/

title: KBG
description:
K.B.G. , a free download app is intended mainly to test and sharpen your knowledge about jainism.

To start with, currently it has quiz about  "paryushan" maha parv of jain religion. There are also exciting prizes to be won.

Its knowledge of janism with fun and prizes

this app is in similar format like KBC game show.

you will be presented set of 9 questions. there are 3 life lines as well. you can score marks based on how fast you answer the question and with or without use of life lines.

On scoring particular marks you can become eligible for exciting prizes.

Paryushan is one of the most auspicious festival of jain religion and this quize is entitled to sharpen your knowledgebase about the same.

title: Air a' Chloc
description:
Ionnsaich mar a dh’innseas tu an Uair anns a’ Ghàidhlig. Leis an app eadar-obrachail againn, tha e furasta èisteachd ris an uair anns a’ Ghàidhlig agus a leughadh. Tha measgachadh mòr de dh’uairean agus ùineachan ann as urrainn dhut a phractasadh, agus mòd deuchainn leis am faigh thu a-mach ciamar a tha a’ dol dhut. Mar as motha a dh’èisteas tu ris an uair, ’s ann as luaithe a thig do sgilean air adhart. Le bhith ga chleachdadh gu tric, bidh thu a’ tuigsinn mar a chanas tu an uair sa Ghàidhlig agus a’ togail air do sgilean èisteachd le bhith ag ràdh na h-uair’ ri do charaidean agus ris an teaghlach. Feuch gum bi spòrs agad!

Na tha ann:

Còrr is 800 faidhle fuaim

Mòd practas stad-uaireadair gus faicinn ciamar a thèid dhut ann an rèisean 30, 45 & 60 diog.
 
Mòd deuchainn gus faicinn ciamar a tha thu a’ tighinn air adhart.

Gnìomhan air an togail air diofar ùineachan gus an t-ionnsachadh agad a chur an òrdugh:
	•	1 mhionaid
	•	5 mionaidean
	•	10 mionaidean
	•	cairteal na h-uarach
	•	leth-uair
	•	uair a thìde

Clocaichean le notaichean a chuidicheas luchd-ionnsachaidh nas òige tuigsinn mar a leughas iad cloc.

* Chaidh an app seo a dhealbhachadh airson tablet - 's dòcha gum bi na dealbhan beag air fònaichean làimhe.  

----

Learn to tell the Time in Scottish Gaelic. With our easy to use interactive app, you can practise listening to and reading the time in Gaelic. There are endless combinations of times and intervals for you to practise and a test mode to find out how you’re doing. The more you practise listening to the time, the quicker your skills will develop. With frequent use you will start to understand the time in Scottish Gaelic and build on your listening skills by speaking the time out loud to friends & family. Have fun!

Featuring:

Over 800 sound files

Stopwatch practice mode to see how you perform over 30, 45 & 60 second sprints.

Test mode to see how you are progressing.

Activities structured by intervals of time to organise your learning:

- 1 minute
- 5 minute
- 10 minute
- Quarter hour
- Half hour
- Hourly

Annotated clocks to help younger learners to understand how to read a clock.

* This app was designed for use on a tablet - the graphics may be small on mobile phones.

title: Yes! Pre-K Can
description:
Yes! Pre-K Can is an innovative, bilingual digital learning platform containing fun, culturally-relevant activities, videos and music geared to instill a Pre-K Success Mindset™ in the minds of young children and their families. 
 
A Pre-K Success Mindset™ includes:
-Independence & confidence
-Curiosity and exploration
-Expression of imagination and creativity
-Expressions of self
-Empathy and compassion
-Growth mindset and self-efficacy
-Social and emotional learning
 
The following concepts are just some of the topics explored in the Pre-K program and using the application in tandem with the YOKC In-Class Teacher Curriculum and Family Engagement programs further enhances these types of concepts:
-Development of social skills
-Expanding language and vocabulary skills
-School connectedness
-Joy of learning
-Educational purpose
-Coping mechanisms & conflict resolution
 
The Yes! Pre-K Can program fosters greater family engagement in schools and creates intrinsically motivated pre-kindergarten students that are well prepared for a formal education in Kindergarten.
 
If you are interested in implementing this program in your school contact us at john@ourkidscan.org.

title: كنوز العربية الكتاب الأول
description: سلسلة تعليمية متكاملة تهدف إلى تأسيس منهجية مناسبة للطفل في بداية رحلته الدراسية، حيث جمع منهاج اللغة العربية في دفتيه كتاباً بمستويين، تميز بمادته التعليمية الميسرة وتهيئة الطفل للكتابة من خلال الأشكال والخطوط المختلفة ورسم الأشكال المبسطة وتلوينها ثم التدرج بالتعرف على شكل الحرف ورسمه بشكل سليم ومتكرر، وتعليم الكتابة بشكل تدريجي مع زيادة المهارات الأساسية الأخرى، كالاستماع والكتابة والقراءة.

title: SQWISS!
description:
Was ist SQWISS?
SQWISS ist die weltweit einzige App mit Murmeltieren, Augmented reality und intelligenten Inhalten. Die richtige App für Superbrains! Alles dreht sich um die Kultur und Geschichte der Schweiz. Und das ist cool! Denn stell dir vor: Die Murmeltiere haben die ganze Schweiz  untertunnelt. Auch da wo du wohnst oder zur Schule gehst, gibt es unsichtbare Gänge! Und überall haben die Munggen ihre Löcher platziert. Mit Vorliebe bei Kulturschätzen, von denen es 10'000ende gibt. Mit dem Smartphone kannst du die Munggen aus den Löchern locken, ihre Fragen beantworten und Wissenspunkte sammeln. Wer kommt am höchsten im Highscore? Nach jedem gespielten Loch siehst du deinen aktualisierten Level im Highscore. Gehörst du zu den Besten, kannst du tolle Preise gewinnen. Und du darfst exklusiv am Gameland von SQWISS teilnehmen. Dort treffen sich die besten SQWISSler und können sich live mit anderen messen. Die Anlässe finden alljährlich jeweils im Mai statt. Wo und wann genau, darüber werden wir dich rechtzeitig informieren.

Upps, der Wurm ist drin!
Aufgepasst: Plötzlich taucht der gefürchtete IGITTIGIZZ auf! Das ist ein Monsterwurm, der dir viele Punkte wegfressen kann. Doch du kannst ihn abwehren, denn zum Glück gibt es die SQWISS-Superwaffe! Welche das ist, verraten wir hier nicht! Nur soviel: Es braucht Köpfchen und – wenn du gut bist – kannst du noch höher steigen im Highscore.

Augmented reality
SQWISS bietet AR auf dem höchsten Level: Die virtuellen Figuren bewegen sich wie echt im Raum. Du kannst um die Murmeltiere herumgehen und sogar in ihre Löcher schauen. Gegen hundert verschiedene Munggen sind im Spiel. Auch Schlafmützen, Vielfrasse, Ritter, Kämpfer, Schwörer, ganze Familien. Lass dich überraschen!

SQWISSIS und MAGICSTICKS
Zusätzlich gibt es bei SQWISS die SQWISSIS. Das sind coole In-App-Games. Bei "Tells Apfelschuss" kannst du dich als Meisterschützen beweisen. Oder du nimmst den MAGICSTICK. Damit kannst du Schmetterlinge aus dem Boden zaubern. Oder das Telldenkmal vom Sockel holen. Tell mitten im Schulzimmer? In der Badi? Oder auf dem Pilatus? SQWISS macht solche fantastischen Zaubereien möglich.

Screenshots 
Spannend ist die App mit all diesen tollen AR-Funktionen, weil sie eine clevere Screenshot-Funktion hat. Damit kannst du Pics von deinen Kolleginnen oder Kollegen mit den Murmeltieren oder anderen virtuellen Objekten machen. Oder selbstverständlich auch von dir, wenn du jemanden dabei hast. Poste die Fotos rum, deine Community wird staunen!

title: Coloring For Kids
description:
Coloring for Kids is a free coloring game for toddlers, preschool, and kindergarten kids. We designed this learning game especially for 2 – 5 years old children. There are fun and awesome animals to color in this amazing kids game The best thing is that your kids can enjoy coloring inside for Free and without paying anything.
Coloring for Kids is not designed only for your 2-5 years old kids but for your son as well. Your children can color many animals whenever they want. Let your kids be creative by downloading this free game. We have a very wide selection of pages that are ready to be colored and we also integrated some awesome and beautiful colors that they will love.

Why do you need to download and install Coloring for Kids on your android smartphone or tablet for Free instead of other animals coloring games?
★ Easy gameplay, you need just to choose the image that you want to color and start coloring easily!
★ Cute but realistic pieces of animals that will enable your preschool and kindergarten kids to be more creative.
★ Coloring for Kids is Free and it will stay free for life, so there’s no hidden fees, no special memberships, and no annual subscription fees.
★ Your kids can improve their creativity by playing our game.
★ A simple gameplay designed especially for toddler fingers and hands. It is playable by young kids and will help them develop their coloring skills.
★ We have a very wide selection of coloring pages that need to be colored. The animals that we have right now are dog, cat, fish, and bird. We will add more and more.
★ A stunning collection of colors that your kids will love.

If you are a parent of toddlers, you will understand how hard it is to keep them occupied. It is even harder to make them learn something that doesn’t interest them. Don’t worry. We created this learning game just for your kids. We are parents ourselves and understand the psychology of learning. Your kids will learn something useful while enjoying every minute of it.
What are you waiting for? Download Coloring for Kids and let your kid enjoy the best kids game ever!

title: Kids Catch : Animals
description:
It's a game of catching moles for children and infants.

Hey, Kids! The mole's breaking into the garden.
A cute mole, cat, and dog appeared in the hole and went back inside.
Touch and score when the animals come out of the hole.
The speed at which animals come out is getting faster and faster.
Use a hammer to catch moles, cats and dogs.
Do not pop fruit such as apples, grapes, or lemons.
The game offers fun for children and infants.
The game of catching moles provide cute characters, animals and fruits.
This educational game helps children and infants develop their agility.
this is the best free game.

title: Kids Pair : Memory
description:
It is a game of same picture-finding game such as cars, animals, and fruits for children and infants.

The same picture-finding game is a memory-enhancing game which you find three pairs of identical pictures on six cards.
There are three versions such as animals, fruits and vegetables, cars, and airplanes.
Select 2 cards from the 6 cards that are inverted to find the same picture.
While looking for the same picture, you can learn words and hear English pronunciation with 18 kinds of animals, 18 kinds of fruits and vegetables, and 18 kinds of vehicle.
In addition, it helps children and infants improve their memory.
- The game offers fun for children and infants.
- It contains beautiful and interesting images such as animals, vegetables, fruits, cars, and airplanes for children.
- It provides visual memory training for infants.
- It helps children learn vocabulary.
- It is easy for children to play and operate this game.
- There are many kinds of cars, trucks, police cars, fire trucks, ambulances, ready mixed concrete car, excavator, airplanes, motorcycles, rockets, trains, buses, and so on.
- Pandas, crocodiles, elephants, bears, lions, tigers, dogs, fish, giraffes, zebras, pigs, sheep, koalas, and so on.
- There are many kinds of fruits such as apples, watermelons, bananas, lemons, grapes, strawberries, corn, onions, pumpkins, carrots, peaches and cherries.
- this is the best free game.
Tenkids offers educational games for infants aged 0 to 6.

title: Gut microbes battle – fight bad microbes
description:
The microbes in our gut are both our helpers and possible enemies. 

In this game you get the idea about this important and complicated microbiome by playing an attractive game in 3D virtual reality. 

This is a kind of a stealth game.You are represented in this 3D world as an avatar finding yourself in the cross section of the gut with mouth somewhere above you (not visible). So the food transport occurs from top to bottom and you soon encounter e.g. a cucumber that lands on your level and small bears (=healthy food particles) start to march out of it to the gut wall having for their goal the factory which denotes the metabolism and biosynthesis. There they enable the creation of the elephants - macrophages - which jump towards you and circle around you in order to protect you. You have also another way of getting your protection. If you bump into the good food that has descended, bunnies come out of it. They stand for antibodies killing the evil antigens just like the macrophages also kill the antigens. However when you bump into bad food the antigens (small white combatants) emerge and start to shoot around. The antigens come also out of the harmful food or bacteria you swallowed - denoted here by the battle bus. There is also a capsule landing and out of it come the strange looking antibiotics with three legs. They also stand on your side, but beware of the toxins - robots - which after seeing you they run after you and shoot deadly shots at you.
If you know something (try my BioanimComplete to increase the knowledge) about biology, you can easily fill your health back to 100% by bumping into the correct quiz object. There are alwqays 3 quiz objects in a row and if you walk or run into one, all three diasappear, but in case you hit the correct object, your health reaches the maximal level and on your back a yellow skateboard appears. If you hit a wrong object, you lose 5 points of your health. Correct objects are those that are meaningfully related to health or healthy digestion or cellular digestion.

title: Baby Panda's Brave Jobs
description:
Search for "BabyBus" for even more free games for you to try! 

A new day has begun, which job would you like to try? Come here! Baby panda has all brave jobs for you!

CHOOSE YOUR DREAM JOB
What do you want to be when you grow up? Policeman, doctor, firefighter or astronaut? Freely choose from different brave jobs and enjoy the chance to help others with our baby panda!

CHANGE JOB COSTUMES
Different job has different clothes and props! Dress up and begin your work! Learn how to use professional equipment!

COMPLETE JOB TASKS
Put out fires, catch thieves and help citizens, go into space, bandage wounds…. Stick to it and complete your task with baby panda. 

Features:
♥ Four job themes: Policeman, doctor, fireman, and astronaut.
♥ Different costumes: Police uniforms, white coats, fireman uniforms, spacesuits…
♥ 20+ props: Handcuffs, thermometers, fire extinguishers, helmets…
♥ Job tasks: Launch a rocket, catch thieves, drive a fire engine, bandage wounds...
♥ Fun and interactive job games help improve your professional cognition.

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Bank ATM Simulator - Kids Learning Games
description:
This bank ATM cash simulator is a kids learning game. Kids really love all kinds of shopping games. The bank manager is out at the teller machine and is supervising cashier and teller. They are filling ATM cash for the customers. Have you ever wonder how a real ATM machine work? So let’s move towards teller and money register to learn and handle this amazing ATM cash vending machine. Learn the art of being an efficient Teller and bank ATM Cash register manager. It’s a good learning tool for kids.

Move onto the city shopping mall for festival shopping mania. Use Bank ATM Cash simulator for drawing money for toy shopping. Have fun learning with money calculations. Let your virtual mom and virtual dad help you to handle this bank ATM cash register in this kids learning game. Once you learn how to operate, you can have your own checking account at the nearest bank ATM machine. For shopping you can use debit card or credit card. Bank ATM manager will assist you. You can pay bills, can give cash or checks. This Bank ATM Cash Simulator is similar as cash register handling. Bank manager will ease your task in withdrawing money from ATM machine vault. This is an awesome opportunity for young kids and toddlers to learn all the operations of this Bank ATM machine simulator. Kids free learning game will teach you basic functions of an automated bank teller machine. Be your own cash manager, handle all transaction and show you virtual family quick learning skills. Play role like a pro Bank ATM manager who is a cash handling expert. Use ATM and Teller machines to take out dollars and submit utility bills. Keep check on your balances.

Insert your bank ATM Cash card into the machine. Enter PIN Code. Learn to handle cash machine register management. Learn basic mathematical functions like addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.  Help your kids to learn ATM & Cash machines. It’s a fun to learn game and to get money and buy toys, yummy fast food, designer clothes, amazing breakfast and sweet candy & cakes. Kids will learn to be the best bank ATM machine simulator to manager their own bank accounts. Keep track of transactions and withdrawals. Shop for their favorite items. It’s an educational learning fun frenzy mania game.


Bank ATM Cash Simulator – Kids Learning Game Features:

•	Kids & Toddler Game of All Ages.
•	Use Debit/Credit cards for cash.
•	Learn to Handle Teller Machines.
•	Withdraw $ Bills & Coins.
•	Go for Shopping at Mall.
descriptionHTML:
This bank ATM cash simulator is a kids learning game. Kids really love all kinds of shopping games. The bank manager is out at the teller machine and is supervising cashier and teller. They are filling ATM cash for the customers. Have you ever wonder how a real ATM machine work? So let’s move towards teller and money register to learn and handle this amazing ATM cash vending machine. Learn the art of being an efficient Teller and bank ATM Cash register manager. It’s a good learning tool for kids.

Move onto the city shopping mall for festival shopping mania. Use Bank ATM Cash simulator for drawing money for toy shopping. Have fun learning with money calculations. Let your virtual mom and virtual dad help you to handle this bank ATM cash register in this kids learning game. Once you learn how to operate, you can have your own checking account at the nearest bank ATM machine. For shopping you can use debit card or credit card. Bank ATM manager will assist you. You can pay bills, can give cash or checks. This Bank ATM Cash Simulator is similar as cash register handling. Bank manager will ease your task in withdrawing money from ATM machine vault. This is an awesome opportunity for young kids and toddlers to learn all the operations of this Bank ATM machine simulator. Kids free learning game will teach you basic functions of an automated bank teller machine. Be your own cash manager, handle all transaction and show you virtual family quick learning skills. Play role like a pro Bank ATM manager who is a cash handling expert. Use ATM and Teller machines to take out dollars and submit utility bills. Keep check on your balances.

Insert your bank ATM Cash card into the machine. Enter PIN Code. Learn to handle cash machine register management. Learn basic mathematical functions like addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Help your kids to learn ATM & Cash machines. It’s a fun to learn game and to get money and buy toys, yummy fast food, designer clothes, amazing breakfast and sweet candy & cakes. Kids will learn to be the best bank ATM machine simulator to manager their own bank accounts. Keep track of transactions and withdrawals. Shop for their favorite items. It’s an educational learning fun frenzy mania game.


Bank ATM Cash Simulator – Kids Learning Game Features:

• Kids & Toddler Game of All Ages.
• Use Debit/Credit cards for cash.
• Learn to Handle Teller Machines.
• Withdraw $ Bills & Coins.
• Go for Shopping at Mall.
summary: Learn to handle Bank ATM Cash Machine & Credit Card Operations in ATM Simulator

title: Fractions
description:
About VIkalp:

Vikalp India Private Limited is a social enterprise which implements experiential learning in math for students in almost 350 schools across India. 

About the game:
The game has been designed on the concept of fractions where children can learn and master the concept by playing it. 
The game tries to develop mathematical thinking and accuracy in children through stories, reflective questions & answers and different levels of score based games.

title: Fire Fighter Kids
description:
What do you want to be ?
"I want to be a fireman!"
"Be a fireman? Do you know What fireman do everyday?"
Come on! Follow with the Uncle bear to find out the secret of fireman!
Alarm rang!
Baby fireman ready to rescue! Don’t worry, we will rescue everyone one by one!
We get a report, mountain explorers encountered the forest fire! Don’t be afraid, baby fireman is coming! Rescue helicopter has arrived, an orderly rescue can help you get away faster!
Fire trucks have to be cleaned after a busy day! Please pick up the tools and repair the damaged parts , don’t forget to fill the tank either.
"Baby Fireman"give a oppturnity to your children experience the fireman's life! Help your children to improve the professional awareness of fireman.This is a special game to develop  cognitive ability, practical ability, exploration and thinking ability  of your children!

Game Features:
Help children to know about fireman and their life;
Easy operation and rich content;
Diversified game is good for children's brain development;
Comprehensive game guide to help children find problems and solve problems．

Please rate our games and leave feedback to help us improve our products, services and the team itself.

title: Connect the dots for toddlers+
description:
*** Full Version of the App - No further purchase required *** 

*** Fun EDUCATIONAL game for toddlers of AGE 3.5 and up 
*** Connect the dots, LEARN NUMBERS, DRAWING and COUNTING
*** Developed with certified child psychologists 
*** 12 beautiful mini-game boards 

About the game: 
----------------- 
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed.

The game is designed to enhance the following skills: 
- Numbers and counting
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Visual perception 
- Concentration

All our products are designed and developed in cooperation with certified child psychologists and experienced educators.

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team: 
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.

title: Doomsday Algorithm Trainer
description:
The Doomsday Algorithm is a  method to calculate the day of the week for any given date and involves four steps. 

This app will explain the different steps and gives simple assignments to train yourself in memorizing specific dates or to practice simple calculation steps.

Professor John Conway, the inventor of the Doomsday algorithm, trains every day and finds the answer within a few seconds. Impress your friends and family with your amazing mental skills.

Use the Training Field to practice partial memorizing and calculation steps. Practice your skills in the Battle Field and beat Conway.

Characteristics of this app:
- Completely free of charge, available in the Play Store
- No annoying ads during gameplay
- Created in Unity 2018.2 by one person. Your feedback is highly apprecitiated, so I can further improve the app.
