title: Little Panda Chinese Festival
description:
Little Panda Chinese Festival will introduce the life in China to you. There are annual events like Chinese New Year, the Lantern Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and the Mid-Autumn Festival.

Download Little Panda Chinese Festival, cook Chinese delicacies to celebrate traditional festivals! Make rice cake with girl panda Miumiu, help boy panda Kiki win the dragon boat race, send moon  cakes to baby bunny Momo...More festival surprises await you!

TRADITIONAL CHINESE FESTIVALS
Celebrate Chinese New Year and many other festivals. You can select your favorite festival!

SPECIAL TREATS
Noodles, tofu, moon cakes, yuanxiao, colorful dumplings and more! Different food for different Chinese festival! Have fun and explore! 

FESTIVAL GAMES
Mazes, the dragon boat race, jigsaw puzzles...there are lots of festival games to choose from. 

CHINESE PAPERMAKING
Papermaking is always fun! Let's do it together!

You'll learn:
1. Traditional Chinese festival customs.
2. How to make traditional Chinese festival foods.
3. Improve your hand-eye coordination and learn to share with others!

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Yasa Pets School
description:
It’s time for school … Pick a locker and sit next to your friends in class! Win the sports competition and celebrate with a pizza party. Then graduate with a diploma and go to the Prom!

Yasa Pets School is totally FREE with NO in app purchases !! 


Features include:


* Explore a new school full of fun activities! 
* Help the teachers give fun lessons to their students!
* Lots of cute bunnies and adorable kitties to play with!
* Eat lunch in the school cafeteria sitting beside all of your friends!
* Try fun experiments in the school laboratory!
* Collect lots of outfits for school and sports!
* Play on the school basketball and football teams!
* Compete in the gymnastics competition!
* Visit the principal’s office! Or visit the nurse’s office!
* Unlock the HIGH SCHOOL GRADUATION by collecting STARS !!!!
* Graduate with a diploma and go to the photo studio!
* Get dressed up and go to prom to party with your whole class!!
* Then go home and have a sleepover with friends!


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****


HIGH SCHOOL GRADUATION : Collect 6 stars to see the whole class graduate from high school!!  All of the students get a diploma and a special gown!! Hand out awards at the prizegiving!!

HIGH SCHOOL PROM : Take a family portrait in the photography studio!! Students get to dress in prom dresses and tuxedos for their special night! They will never forget their high school prom!

CLASSROOM : When the bell rings students must be at their desks before the grumpy teacher arrives! Make sure Kitties and Bunnies have done their homework and are ready for the test!

SCIENCE LABORATORY : Students dress in special lab coats and safety goggles when carrying out crazy experiments!!  Use the cool scientific equipment!!  Examine the amazing bugs in the specimen jars!!

SCHOOL CAFETERIA : After lots of studying, students line up for a delicious lunch.  The dinner lady has warm tasty meals for hungry children!  Choose between pizza, roast chicken or fish with lots of healthy vegetables and delicious cup cakes for desert!

SCHOOL NURSE : When a student has a tummy ache or bumps their head the school nurse will look after them in her office!  The nurse has lots of medicines and puts plasters on wounds!  She might even let students rest in the bed and watch some TV instead of going back to class!

SCHOOL PRINCIPAL’S OFFICE : Naughty students get sent to see the headmaster!!  The headmaster is always in his office to make sure that everyone behaves well and learns their lessons.  Better not get caught running in the corridor or you’ll find yourself in detention!!

SCHOOL GYM : The students love sports!!  The school gym has lots of fun games for everyone to play … choose between Basketball, Football and Gymnastics!!  There are lots of uniforms and plenty of sports equipment to use!  After the game have a hot shower in the locker room!!  Give trophies and medals to the winners!!

 HOME : After school have a sleepover with friends from school!!  Order pizza or burgers and ice-cream to be delivered!!  Play computer games, watch TV and feed the parrots in a fancy apartment.  Then get ready for school in the morning … there is a big day of learning ahead! 

***


Enjoy playing Yasa Pets School? Leave us a review, we love hearing from you.

For any other issues send us an email at support@yasapets.com

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more, please read our privacy policy : https://www.yasapets.com/privacy-policy/

www.youtube.com/c/YasaPets
www.facebook.com/YasaPets
www.instagram.com/yasapets

title: Baby Panda’s Handmade Crafts
description:
Are you looking for ideas about handmade crafts? Ever wanted to be a craftsman? Baby panda has a lot of references for you! 

Baby Panda’s Handmade Crafts shows how to recycle ‘waste’ like beer cap, paper plate, chopsticks... and turn them into beautiful handmade crafts. Do not throw away old things! Discover new uses for them! You can make attractive accessories and unique gifts for all holidays and special events. Get inspired by these amazing designs of Baby Panda’s Handmade Crafts and learn how you can recycle old things for handmade crafts at home! The fun, and magic, never end!

Features:
♥ Handmade Creations: Make kites, flowers, necklaces and more! 
♥ Recycling Materials: Beer cap, paper plate, chopsticks and more! 
♥ Mystical Magic: Move your wand and watch the magic happens! 
♥ Colorful Tools: Scissors, rubber, glue, colored crayons and much, much more!
♥ Eco-friendly Robot: Make the panda town greener!
♥ Badges: Complete green quests to earn badges!

You will learn: 
1. Environmental awareness in daily life.
2. Utilizing your creativity to make awesome trinkets.
3. Improve hand-eye coordination and learn to be conscious of the environment.

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————

Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Panda Lu & Friends - Crazy Playground Fun
description:
Meet your new pocket friend - tiny panda Lu! Take good care of baby Lu! Feed, dress up, sing to sleep & play with friends in Lu’s backyard! It’s full of surprises! Explore it and find new fun adventures on every corner!

Panda Lu loves to play outside! But the baby needs a lot of energy for this! Make sure baby Lu eats and sleeps well! Offer a variety of yummy foods to Lu and don’t forget to visit the bathroom afterward! Choose among tons of cool and funny outfits for baby Lu! Decorate panda’s house and look through Pandaroid photos from Lu’s travels!

Panda Lu can’t wait to go outside to play with friends - baby birds and animals! The backyard is full of fun! What about going treasure hunting and gold mining? Or building the most amazing sand castles? Even a simple tire can be fun if you think creatively! Try to get these juicy apples from the tree - that’s quite a challenge!

Try out all the super fun slides and catch candies! Time to get creative and decorate the airplane spring rider! Now panda Lu and friends can fly in the sky! But beware of obstacles! Let’s jump on a trampoline and play with soap bubbles with the baby owl!

Play cute and fun panda babysitting game for girls and boys:
· Take care of baby Lu: feed, dress up and sing to sleep!
· Don’t forget to check panda Lu’s stats!
· Play crazy outdoor games with Lu’s animal friends!
· Try treasure hunting!
· Build beautiful sand castles!
· Catch butterflies and try to get apples from the tree!
· Ride all the slides!
· Fly in the airplane spring rider!
· Jump on a trampoline and play with soap bubbles!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids

descriptionHTML:
Meet your new pocket friend - tiny panda Lu! Take good care of baby Lu! Feed, dress up, sing to sleep & play with friends in Lu’s backyard! It’s full of surprises! Explore it and find new fun adventures on every corner!

Panda Lu loves to play outside! But the baby needs a lot of energy for this! Make sure baby Lu eats and sleeps well! Offer a variety of yummy foods to Lu and don’t forget to visit the bathroom afterward! Choose among tons of cool and funny outfits for baby Lu! Decorate panda’s house and look through Pandaroid photos from Lu’s travels!

Panda Lu can’t wait to go outside to play with friends - baby birds and animals! The backyard is full of fun! What about going treasure hunting and gold mining? Or building the most amazing sand castles? Even a simple tire can be fun if you think creatively! Try to get these juicy apples from the tree - that’s quite a challenge!

Try out all the super fun slides and catch candies! Time to get creative and decorate the airplane spring rider! Now panda Lu and friends can fly in the sky! But beware of obstacles! Let’s jump on a trampoline and play with soap bubbles with the baby owl!

Play cute and fun panda babysitting game for girls and boys:
· Take care of baby Lu: feed, dress up and sing to sleep!
· Don’t forget to check panda Lu’s stats!
· Play crazy outdoor games with Lu’s animal friends!
· Try treasure hunting!
· Build beautiful sand castles!
· Catch butterflies and try to get apples from the tree!
· Ride all the slides!
· Fly in the airplane spring rider!
· Jump on a trampoline and play with soap bubbles!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

title: Cute & Tiny Sandwiches - Quick Lunch For Baby Pets
description:
Make delicious snacks for kitty Sue, puppy Bu and bunny Blu! Prepare fun shaped vegetable, cheese, salami and even sweet sandwiches! Slice and arrange bread and other ingredients! Enjoy quick, easy and yummy lunch ideas!

Make sandwiches according to the baby animals’ unique tastes! Puppy Bu is a big fun of cheese and salami sandwiches! Kitty Sue has a sweet tooth and likes her snacks with whipped cream, banana and strawberry! Bunny Blu loves veggies! Add fresh cucumbers and tomatoes to his sandwich!

title: Do Not Disturb 3 - Grumpy Marmot Pranks!
description:
Mr. Grumpy is back, but he’s on vacation! Will you respect his alone time and let him relax?

Yeah, right!

Discover even more fun, silly and creative ways to disturb your favorite grumpy marmot and don’t go away until you run out of pranks! Which will never ever happen!

Laugh out loud with Mr. Grumpy’s “thrilled” reactions, and get creative to find out just how many grumpy faces an annoyed marmot can make!

And don’t worry about the big flashy DO NOT DISTURB sign on his door: it actually means “welcome” in marmot talk!

HIGHLIGHTS

🐻PLAY many, many, different kinds of pranks on Mr. Grumpy and give him the relaxing vacation he so desperately needed!

🐻TAP everywhere to find new ways of annoying Mr. Grumpy and have fun discovering endless pranks! There are many surprises hiding in plain sight, so tap, tap tap and then tap some more!

🐻LAUGH with Mr. Grumpy’s funny reactions and see if you can watch every single grumpy animation of our beloved marmot!

🐻BECOME the best prankster ever and prove your skills by never getting caught!
Mr. Grumpy secretly loves your attention, he just has a very marmot-like way to show it!

Don’t let him spend his vacation all alone and show up in his doorstep unannounced: he’ll love the surprise!

If Mr. Grumpy yells DO NOT DISTURB and doesn’t answer the door, don’t worry: you’ll find tons of ways to lure him out!

Third time is always the charm, and mr. Grumpy has lots of charm if you look really hard! Just knock on his door and don’t go away until he answers! Don’t let him see you, though: he’ll love the mystery!

Download now and catch up with the cutest grumpy marmot ever!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Cute & Tiny Preschool - Learning With Baby Pets
description:
Cute and tiny kitty Sue, puppy Bu and bunny Blu are going back to preschool! Visit their fun kindergarten and develop new skills! Learn to recognize and match shapes, sizes and patterns! Color in cute pictures! Learn to count! Develop fine motor and cognitive skills!

Help kitty Sue, puppy Bu and bunny Blu solve their fun and educational tasks! Match shapes, notice size differences, recognize patterns, sort objects according to their color. Tons of tasks with simple and more complicated objects: triangles, circles, apples, cherries, bees and more!

Lunch time! Eat yummy fruits and veggies and check your Math skills! Next, the baby animals are having an art class! Color in adorable pictures - choose the right color for each element!

Cute and simple graphics. Kid-friendly interface. Safe environment for playing and learning. Suitable for toddlers and younger kids.

title: Nursery Rhymes DJ - KinToons
description:
Wouldn’t it be great if you could choose the nursery rhyme songs you most want to hear?  Better yet, what if you could choose whichever KinToons characters you want to sing those songs?  And to sing them in any order you like!

Your favorite KinToons’ characters -- Janet, Merle, Uga, and Paolo -- are back in a new and exciting talking and singing game – Nursery Rhyme DJ! After learning ABC and having fun with numbers, let your kids dive into a musical world of nursery rhymes!

This baby-friendly DJ game is unlike any ordinary cat/kitten simulator or even one of the ABCD/alphabet games for kids where they just diddle away their free time. It is a place where a pre-school toddler can simply sing, dance and enjoy while learning at the same time.

UNIQUE WAY OF LEARNING

•	Presenting an all new gameplay based on phonics games made for kids that will help your child learn their favorite tunes.
•	In kindergarten or preschool, children will just learn the nursery rhymes, but here they will do so along with the characters in an immersive and interactive way.

CUTE & EXPRESSIVE CHARACTERS
•	Enjoy funny expressions in an entirely unique universe in which they talk, sing and more!
•	A Viking girl, a gentle giant, a smart, flying tortoise and a wise owl – the perfect combo for your children to enjoy.

VIBRANT VOICE OVERS
•	Since each character has a distinct voice, each nursery rhyme can be played in the character’s own voice.
•	You can mix and match all their voices in any order and have fun.

EDUCATIVE ENVIRONMENTS
•	Set in environments like a farm, bedroom, river lands, etc. the game provides a learning platform in an app in which characters play games and present songs made for kids.
•	The first two environments are free, but you can get one more colorful world by purchasing it individually or in a pack.
•	Each one has some elements that can be interacted with and give you Happiness points. Fill the Happiness Bar to see the magic!
HIGHLIGHTS
•	Fun and simple gameplay for kids
•	4 lovable characters from the KinToons universe with unique voice-overs
•	3 nursery rhymes to choose from in 4 different voices
1.	Open Shut 
2.	If you are happy 
3.	Row your boat 

•	3 enchanted backgrounds
•	Easy controls
•	Cute graphics
•	Much more…
Would you like to see more children games for your kiddo?
•	Humpty Dumpty
•	Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
•	Old Macdonald Had A Farm
•	Rain Rain Go Away
•	Yankee Doodle
•	Five Little Monkeys
•	Baa Baa Black Sheep
•	Or Something Else?
Let us know your favorite ones from school! We’ll be working on more in the future!

Before you download this app, please consider that this app has advertising. If you do not want to see ads, you have an option to pay to remove ads within this app and have an ads free experience. In case you decide to continue with ads, please know that our Ad Partners are fully COPPA and GDPR compliant. If you do not want to receive Targeted Ads on your mobile Device, your mobile Device may give you the option to opt-out of receiving Ads on all apps on your Device. Please refer our Privacy Policy document here for further details- https://kinsane.com/privacy-policy

The King of Fighters '97 is a 1997 fighting game produced by SNK for the Neo Geo arcade and home console. It is the fourth game in The King of Fighters series. It was ported to the Neo-Geo CD, as well as the PlayStation and the Sega Saturn in Japan only. The Saturn requires the same 1MB RAM cartridge utilized by the previous game.

title: Cute & Tiny Magic Makeover - Fantasy Fashion
description:
Welcome to the world of magic, sparkles and rainbows! Here, cute and tiny animals - kitty Sue, puppy Bu and bunny Blu - can get the craziest style and fashion makeovers! Prepare your magic wands, potions and costumes! Use your imagination and become the best style wizard!

Help bunny Blu take a magic bubble bath and make his fur neon green! Cover kitty Sue in magic flowers and - hocus-pocus! - she’s a different color now! Use the rainbow potion to completely change puppy Bu’s look!

Dress up baby animals in the craziest fantasy outfits! Choose among tons of colorful overalls, shoes and head accessories! Turn the animal friends into baby unicorns, fairy princesses, cute monsters and other fantasy creatures!

title: Cute & Tiny House Cleanup - Learn Daily Chores
description:
With kitty Sue, puppy Bu and bunny Blu house cleaning is always fun! Teach your kids household chores and improve their sense of responsibility!

Let’s clean up the kitchen with kitty Sue! Start with sorting waste. Recycling is important! Put dirty dishes into a dishwasher. Spray and wipe kitchen cabinets and mop the floor! Now arrange food and dishes in the freshly cleaned kitchen!

Let’s help puppy Bu tidy up his cute but messy room! Find all the dirty toys and put them in a washing machine! Wipe the dust off the furniture and vacuum clean the floor! Find places for the washed toys!

title: Immerz Algebra
description:
DISCOVER. PRACTICE. MASTER.

A math puzzle game which teaches Algebra through amazingly engaging puzzles and daily competitions

WHY IMMERZ?

All over the world, children struggle with Math and Math practice - because it is boring, abstract and disassociated from real life. Immerz is a new, amazingly engaging way to practice Math. Immerz Algebra will help your child learn Linear Equations through interesting puzzles and daily competition - without any coercion from you!

WHAT IS IMMERZ?

Immerz is a mobile math game for 10-16 year olds which combines highly engaging game tools with cutting edge research on learning to create an epically fun math practice experience for each child.

In this Algebra module, your child will be introduced to each new law of algebra through visual puzzles and will get a chance to display her mastery through daily 'Duels' or competitions with other players.

WHAT YOUR CHILD WILL GET

- Interesting visual puzzles that introduce laws of Algebra through discovery and deduction rather than rote learning

- The ability to gain Powers through continued practice

- Daily duels with other players where he/she can display her mastery of the puzzles

- Powers: Block your opponent, Shield from attacks or simply Double your Shunyas!

- A highly engaging alternative to boring Math practice

WHAT YOU WILL GET

- Weekly reports about your child's learning

- Identify your child's strengths and weaknesses

- Know what the next step is

- Freedom from having to force your child to practice Math!

IMMERZ FOR TEACHERS

If you are a teacher looking for innovative techniques to run your Math classroom Immerz is your answer!

- The perfect introduction to the topic of Linear Equations

- Assign homework to your students by asking them....to play a game everyday!

- On special requests we can set up daily reports for you so that you know what each child in your class is doing

title: Toddler Puzzle: Fish & Bubbles🐠
description:
Try out this exciting educational learning app with your toddlers and young children. This is a classic children's educational puzzle geared towards kids entering preschool and kindergarten. Your child will enjoy playing with the colorful fish pieces, recognizing different shapes throughout their experience. 

-This game has kid friendly sound effects that will keep your child engaged and entertained while playing.
-Soothing ambient underwater sounds to keep your child calm and relaxed.
-Specifically designed to have simple and easy to move pieces for babies.
-Suitable for babies, kids, the elderly, and their family and friends.

This app can improve your child's observation skills, fine motor, and tactile skills. This can increase concentration, cognitive ability, memory, creativity and imagination.

title: Perot Museum Virtual Reality Dinaledi Experience
description: Scientists went on an incredible expedition deep into the cave system to recover more than 1,500 fossil bones belonging to at least 15 individuals - exceeding any other human ancestor site in Africa. Berger himself never took a trip into the cave. This discovery that dominated world headlines in science was excavated by a team of six "underground astronauts," paleoanthropologists and archaeologists who were able and willing to pass through an 18cm gap to get to the dig site. The fearless team have shed light on the origins and diversity of the human genus as well as the way early human and hominin evolution is understood. The journey continues as teams are still excavating and exploring underground while colleagues are busy analyzing the fossils in the lab.

title: Mermaid Secrets21–Heartbreak Princess Love Story
description:
The most exciting little girl games for children ever. Princess Mia is taken home by the ocean king. Her first crush Eric is so worry about her and plans to find some information about the mermaid's word in the library. What will he find out? Mermaid princess Mia has a bitter argument with her father. She is so sad and please help her to clean up and make her still be the beautiful princess in the ocean. 
Queen Meredith tries to comfort this heartbreak girl. Will the magical princess recover soon? Princess Mia prepares a special gift for her first love Eric. Such an interesting DIY design.

FEATURES
1. Mermaid princess Mia disappears in the ocean. Where the magical princess is?
2. Sea princess Mia’s first crush Eric can’t find his lover, he is so worry about mermaid Mia’s safety.
3. Ocean princess Mia’s boyfriend Eric comes to the library. Please help him to find some clues about mermaid’s world.
4.Mermaid Mia has a bitter argument with her father underwater. But you are the princess. You need to looks amazing in the coming party! Now, do your hair salon, dress up, pick up your high heels, put your make up to shine. 
5. Don't cry, my poor heart break girl. Now dry your tears, makeup and dressup to release your inner enthusiasm!
6. Queen Meredith is coming and she prepares a prinsessen crown for her perfect girl Mia. Let’s make a unique crown fashion design together.
7. Wow! Look. You will become the gorgeous party queen with this fabulous princess crown. No doubt all pretty boys will come for you. 
8. The heartbreak girl Mia feels so sad and prepares a special gift for her high school lover Eric. Let's help the princess to get ready!
9. DIY girls! Time to show your DIY skills. There's a new DIY queen in ocean-yes, that's right- You!!!- The ocean princess-Mermaid Mia. 
10. Wow, the music box is so beautiful! You are really a genius on your DIY project. Tons of DIY decorations in our beauty DIY games.
11. Mia’s first crush Eric opens the music box. He misses this heartbreak girl Mia so much.
12. OMG, Mia’s secret admire Alan finds out the secrets of mermaid. Will he start an underwater adventure?

Download the free kids game now!Dress up beautiful mermaid princess in dress up games for girls! Play mermaid games right now!

title: Stall Catchers
description:
Stall Catchers is an online game that anyone can play - no experience necessary. In the game, you look at movies from the brains of mice and try to identify vessels as flowing or stalled. This helps to speed up Alzheimer's disease research at Cornell University.

Stall Catchers is part of the EyesOnALZ project. The game was built on one of the oldest volunteer thinking projects: stardust@home, and is using the Virtual Microscope developed by their team. Who knew stardust and blood vessels could be so similar?

Currently, our catchers range from 6 to 88 years old.  A large part of our community includes middle school students, seniors, caregivers and Alzheimer’s patients themselves.

The game is easy to grasp, and we walk you through in the beginning. Check out the 'How to' section in the main menu if you need help at any time. Don't worry about making mistakes - each blood vessel is analysed by multiple catchers, and we ensure we generate reliable crowd answers in the end.

EyesOnALZ is a citizen science project developed by the Human Computation Institute. The project enables everyone to contribute to Alzheimer’s disease research and speed up the search for a treatment. Our first citizen science game - Stall Catchers - was launched in October 2016 and now gathers thousands of volunteers.

The idea was born in 2015, when by a lucky coincidence, Pietro Michelucci met Chris Schaffer, whose lab was in need of citizen scientists’ help. The project was funded by the BrightFocus Foundation and officially began in early 2016.

EyesOnALZ includes collaborators from the Schaffer-Nishimura Lab at Cornell University, stardust@home team at U.C. Berkeley and SciStarter.com. Previous collaborators include Sebastian Seung’s Laboratory at Princeton University, WiredDifferently and others.

EyesOnALZ and Stall Catchers are being developed by the Human Computation Institute, and supported by a team of collaborators, advisors and volunteers from Cornell University, UC Berkeley, SciStarter, and elsewhere worldwide.

The EyesOnALZ Android app is being developed for Human Computation Institute in partnership with Games For Health Europe by Game Solutions Lab.

EyesOnALZ is supported by the BrightFocus foundation and its generous donors. Learn more about their Alzheimer's Disease Research Program.

title: Just Sum Game
description:
Just Sum Game is a easy addition game where you select 3 unique numbers ranging from 1 to 9 that equals the sum. Initially you will see 3 empty question marks and a number on the right hand side of the equal sign, on a black board. 

Example, 
? + ? + ? =SUM
2 + 7 + 1=10

Basically, Select 3 UNIQUE numbers that will add to the total sum. 

If you select a number and change your mind, select the number you want to undo. Select numbers turn white.

NOTE: Future release will bring scoring, time and a range on the numbers to make the game more playable as well as analysis of the combinations and patterns a player uses..

It is guaranteed to help you with your math, and help increase your brains health.

title: Summer Fruit Juice Festival
description:
Hello Kids! Are you thirsty? In this summer season satisfy your thirst and re-energize your body with some cold refreshing juice recipes. Open up your own Fruit Juice shop in Summer Fruit Juice Festival and have some sweet drinks for this summer. In this game we've included Six types of Juice to make and serve. This juice maker game is the place where kids will learn how to make milk shakes and juices using different ingredients.

To make sweet delicious fruit juice, you've to choose the fruit van in level selection screen. We've more than six plus fruit juice available to make in this game like Kiwi, Blueberry, Water Melon, Grapes, Mango and Chikoo. Select your favorite fruit and cut it with knife and put it into mixer jug then add milk and sugar. Put jug on the mixer grinder and your juice is ready to drink. Now select your glass and pour the juice from jug to glass. It's time to decorate your glass with tons of decorative items like Straw, Stickers and fruit. Hurray!! You fruit juice is ready to serve or drink.

You can share picture of ready juice glass with decoration to your friends and family using social media tools. Show off your fruit juice making skill to your friends now!! 

Features of Fruit Juice Festival game:

=> Huge range of Fruit Juice to choose from
=> Make variety of smoothies

=> Over 10+ different glasses to choose from

=> Take picture of ready juice and show off your juice maker skill to your friends and family using Social Media

Download now and make yummy slushy delicious fruit juice!! Make your summer day cool with this free Summer Fruit Juice maker kids game!

title: Pets High 2-Nerdy Girl Against the School Bully
description:
Pets High2 - School Bully is the most fun free girl games. 
Poor school new girl Alisa has been bullied by the mean girl Stacey in high school! She’s got to learn to stand up to the school bully! Now help the new girl in high school use her girl power to become a supergirl so she can show her bully who is the boss! No one will dare to call her nerd anymore. 

Enough is enough! How much bullying can one school girl take?! Nerdy girl Alisa has to somehow put a stop to her school bully. High school girl Alisa can now learn how to defend herself against her school bullies! Help school girl Alisa against the mean kids at school! Girl power now!

Game Features: 
1.It’s time for school! Dress up in nerdy best school clothes and become the best high school girl ever, in the most amazing school games!
2. Oh, no. Who put the bucket there to make the school pranks to the nerd Alisa? 
3. Clean and dress up nerdy Alisa in a cool uniform. Get her ready to fight! No one calls her nerd again!
4. The mean girl pranks the nerdy girl Alisa with firecrackers, make her fart on a whoopie cushion and more! 
5.your teacher gone mad as the firecrackers. Your mad teacher is blaming at you, but you didn’t do anything wrong! 
6.Alisa?! Nerd?! Please! She’s about to become a supergirl in our pet high school ! 
7.Help Alisa to be a super girl and use her girl power stand up to the school bully! 
8.Food Maker! Take your school lunch box and enjoy delicious meals at lunchtime! Make your own pizza & donuts!
9.Have a blast in pet high school classroom with the craziest school pranks you’ve ever seen.

It’s time for the most amazing school games adventure! School nerd games have never been this cool and exciting! Who knew school games could be so much fun?Enjoy the cutest pet high school love story and download the fun games for girls. Play the fun free girl games now.

title: Start Craft building and survival
description:
Are you ready to discover all the secrets of life in a mysterious cubic world? Do you want to Start Craft and Build your Home using craft box and sandbox in a limitless world ? Start Craft adventure is here to help you out !
Start Craft building and survival is a free and amazing building games, full of adventures in the boundless cubic world!
Start your building and show the world your best game and constructions. Top Craft building and survival is a Crafting and Building free game for the whole family:
from kids, boys and girls, to adults.
The main thing in our game is the freedom of decisions and actions. Build whatever you want, or destroy everything that hinders you.
First you must learn to build by building your house in a fortress or a mine.
Decorate your building with friends furniture and your own skin. Learn more and more and you will be capable of building massive structures castles
and temples in no time!
You must avoid evil monsters or zombies at night, stay in the house you have built during the day, even if it is just a small hut or a simple house,
which you can use also to shelter from snowy or winter weather, or ice rain.
Exploration game where you are trying to survive in open world.

title: School Lunch Food - The Best School Lunch Box
description:
It’s time to back to school, Let’s prepare the best school lunch food ever. Which food would you prefer to put in your school lunch box? Hamburger? Pizza? Chicken nuggets? Wow, so many yummy foods to choose from.

Chicken Nuggets

- Add & mix all the ingredients together to the plastic bag - flour, season salt and pepper.
- Cut your chicken breast.
- Dip the chicken breast to the mixture we just made.
- Add & mix the other ingredients - the eggs and the water. Dip the chicken breast in the mixture too.
- Then drag the chicken breast to the oil. Fry them to golden brown, Don’t let them burn.
- Choose the sauce you like best.
- Put the chicken nuggets to your school lunch box.

Cheesy Potato

- Cut the potatoes into cubes. Watch out, Do not cut your fingers.
- Boil the potatoes in the pan. Add some garlic, salt with it. Make sure they are ok to go.
- Use a spoon to crash the potatoes. Hmm, looks yummy now.
- Add the butter, heavy cream and the most important part - cheese with it. Use your spoon to mix it very well.
- Scoop the cheesy potatoes to the plate. Wow, look at the cheese. So much fun.
- Put the chicken nuggets to your school lunch box.

Sweet Corn

- Let’s prepare the corn kernel first. Use your finger to “peel off” the corn.
- Pour the corn into the boil water. 
- Time to decorate. Tons of  decorations to choose from. You will be the best designer ever.
- Scoop the sweet corn to your school lunch box.

Milk
- So many milk flavors to choose from. Pick your favorite one.
- Choose a specific straw for your milk.
- Put your milk to your school lunch box.
And then, when all the foods are done. Decorate your school lunch box in the way you like. You have the most beautiful school lunch box ever. Happy to go to school now^_^

title: Fluffy Trendy Slime - Mermaid & Flower Slime Fun
description:
Like to play slime? Can not help playing fluffy slime all the time? Now it’s a big chance for the big slime fans. The mermaid slime and the flower slime is now ready for playing. Let’s get started!

Mermaid Slime
- Add all the ingredients to the bowl. Clear glue and the food coloring - the mermaid food coloring green and blue.
- Mix the borax and the water together and pour it to the activator.
- Pour the borax water to the mixture and slowly stir it. The fluffy slime is almost ok.
- Have crazy slime fun. The mermaid slime is in your hand. Do whatever you like.
- Decorate the slime with so many mermaid decorations. Wow~ beautiful.

Flower Slime
- First, add school glue, shaving foam to the bowl. 
- You won’t miss the shinning food coloring.
- Mix the borax and the water together and pour it to the activator.
- Pour the borax water to the mixture and slowly stir it. The fluffy slime is almost ok.
- Like flower sprinkle? Okay, make the sprinkle into your slime, the flower slime. Wonderful.
- Have crazy slime fun~

Stay tuned for more fantastic slimes^_^

Hello Happy Kids! Are you ready for Back to School adventure. Don’t Forget to take your lunch. Its healthy to take home made snacks to school. Junior Games Studio presents the latest educational game for kids which encourages school students to cook and pack their own school lunch.

What would you like to take today for your lunch? Choose your own recipes, tie up your apron and cook healthy delicious food and pack them in versatile lunch boxes.

descriptionHTML:
Hello Happy Kids! Are you ready for Back to School adventure. Don’t Forget to take your lunch. Its healthy to take home made snacks to school. Junior Games Studio presents the latest educational game for kids which encourages school students to cook and pack their own school lunch.

What would you like to take today for your lunch? Choose your own recipes, tie up your apron and cook healthy delicious food and pack them in versatile lunch boxes.

Make mouthwatering sandwiches, flavored milk and delicious cupcakes in kitchen.Wait are you missing some thing? yes take crunchy veggies or nutritious fresh fruits to complement your lunch snack.

Features
- Choose your favorite School Lunch recipes
- Gather all the ingredients & Cook in kitchen
- Pack Cooked food in School Lunch boxes


My LunchBox is the for all those kids who hate waiting in long lines at school cafeteria. Eat Healthy & Stay Fit!

title: First Aid Action Hero
description:
Learn how to save lives using First Aid! Be the First Responder in a Medical Emergency! 
Helping someone in a real-life situation can be a little startling, however, with First Aid Action Hero you’ll be ready for action! Practice your BMX tricks on the track and then take the lead to save an injured patient! Kids CAN save lives too, so join St John Ambulance Victoria in knowing how!" 

FIRST AID SCENARIO
Help save an unconscious patient with the St John DRSABC action plan until the Ambulance arrives! You will learn how to:

-Stay safe and protect yourself from Danger 
-Check if a patient is unconscious
-Calmly call Triple Zero (000), speak correctly to the Operator and Emergency Service
-Inspect a casualty’s Airway for foreign material
-Look, listen and feel for signs of Breathing on a person
-Carefully and correctly place a patient in the life-saving Recovery Position

PREPARE YOURSELF
Graphics and game-play help you gain an insight into helping in an emergency, teaching First Aid skills to make you feel more confident assisting a patient who is sick, injured or hurt in the real world. This application provides useful tips and tricks involved in the process of recognising an emergency, calling an ambulance and action to be taken whilst waiting for Paramedics to arrive. 

ABOUT 
This free application is designed to teach children and reinforce First Aid fundamentals from the St John First Aid in Schools Program through an engaging and enjoyable delivery method. This application has been formulated within departments of St John Ambulance Victoria alongside Conduct Digital Agency. 

DISCLAIMER
This application is made available for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for accredited first aid training. The authors have made a considerable attempt to ensure the material is accurate, recent and easily interpreted. St John Ambulance (Vic) Inc. accepts no liability for any inaccuracies in the information provided or the success of the use of any scenarios depicted in this application.

title: DIY Glow In The Dark Desserts! Food Life Hacks
description:
Enjoy this new glow in the dark foods game with some DIY glow hacks using glow paint and neon sticks along with some super magic food tricks with glow powder! These amazing life hacks with your favorite icy foods & new summer desserts can be real fun and you can enjoy these neon desserts even more. Learn cooking these amazing & trendy foods as a magic chef and serve these creations on any glow in the dark party!
Make Glow in the dark foods in galaxy, rainbow and unicorn colors of your dreams make them shine with your lights off!  Make delicious and mouthwatering trending desserts including:

Glow in the dark snow cone:
Make ordinary snow cone and use magic glow in the dark ice at its base to make it glow. Use rainbow and unicorn galaxy neon colros for some added fun.
 
Glow in The dark slush:
Make rainbow unicorn slushy and make it glow in the dark with neon magic ice cubes. The best life hack and creation for the kids who love to enjoy cold ice slushies and are obsessed with slush maker games.
 
Glow in the dark Cotton Candy:
Make this world famous carnival fair food sweet sugar floss that melts in the mouth with every single bite using neon sticks and make it glow in your favorite colors. Enjoy operating cotton candy machine as well and open your own glowing cotton candy shop now. 
 
Download this DIY life hacks game and experiment different techniques with your favorite desserts in rainbow, unicorn and glow in the dark coloring and have fun this summer!

title: Pets High1-Nerdy Girl Back to School
description:
Pets High1 - Back to School is the most fun free girl games for children. 
Time to back to school. Let's get settled into new girl brand-new pets high school! Being the new girl could be tough - let's make some cool friends! OMG - a super cute high school boy is starring at you. Will he be nerdy girl's new boyfriend?
Sometimes being the new girl can lead to disastrous mishaps! From volleyball accidents to love letter, try to be careful! But don’t worry - these crazy incidents just might turn into the way you meet your new best friends… and maybe even your first boyfriend!

Pet Game Features: 
1.Time to back to school! Let's go to the supermarket and get the school supplies now!
2. Now DIY nerdy own school supplies, that's awesome!
3. The first day for nerdy girl in high school is so important, now do the nice hair salon!
4.New pets high school, new look! Dress up in the cutest outfits & impress your crush!
5.OMG - a super cute high school boy is starring at you. Will he fall in love with you later?
6.Good news! The cool guy at school is Jorden. He is just your classmate. Will you get your first crush? 
7. Decorate your locker & meet your hot new crush in our new pet high school!
8.Is that a love letter?? Who could it be from? Did your first crush send it??
9.OMG – I think someone at high school likes you! Could it be your secret crush?!? Is that love letter from Jorden??? I think it just may be the high school crush!
10.ANOTHER fiasco! The school mean girl is mad at you and she played the school pranks on the nerdy girl Alisa. 
11.Just be careful with that volleyball ; Can the mean girl Stacey stop her little school pranks?  Will Stacey revenge on the nerds? 
12.OMG- Kitty Alisa was hurt with the ball! Get her volleyball injury treated at the doctor. 
13.Aaaahhh! Did Jorden just ask the nerdy girl Alisa to go with him for the new glasses? You're so lucky!!! Maybe he’ll become your new boyfriend?!

Enjoy the cutest pet high school love story and enjoy the fun games for girls and children. The nerd game is so fun and experience the high school life. Be the new girl in high school.  Get ready to meet & fall in love with the cutest boy in school! Play the fun free girl games and children's games now.

title: School Pranks - BFF Back To School Prank War!
description:
Time to go back to school now. Have you missed your best friends? Ok, let’s prepare a wonderful present to him/her. Let’s get started.

Coffee Prank

Does you friends like to drink coffee.  The coffee you bought for him/her.  That would taste great.
- Buy your friends a latte, and tell him/her you forgot the sugar.
- Ask him/her to use your sweetener instead. Ok, the sweetener is this: Cut the sweetener and pour out all the sugar and put the tartarit acid instead.
- Watch your friends to pour all the “sweetener” into the coffee.
- Let your friends have a taste. Hahaha~~ Do not forget to take a photo for him/her.

Banana Prank

Are you always hungry in 11 O’clock? Hmm~ prepare a special banana for your friends.

- Find a syringe,  toothpaste for preparation.
- Use the syringe to inhale the toothpaste and “inject” to the banana.
- What taste it would be when your friends eat the banana?
- Do not forget to take a photo for him/her.

Gummy Juice Prank

- Pour out all the juice out through a small cut.
- Add some jelly powder to the juice. Put it on the oven to mix them together.
- Pour the gummy juice to the juice box back.
- Use a tape to seal the juice box.
- What will your friends do when they can not drink the juice? ^_^
- Do not forget to take a photo for him/her.

title: App4Autism - Timer, Visual Planning, Token Economy
description:
App4Autism was born from the need to have an useful visual tool which has a compact format and is always available to manage the behavior of children and teenagers with autism. It is an effective help for all children with autism and attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder as well as for their families and teachers. App4Autism now has three languages: Italian, Vietnamese and English.

Within App4Autism you can access three tools: Timer, Visual Planning (Agenda) and Token Economy. The in-app manual helps parents and teachers know how to use the tools efficiently. You are able to take images and audios you use to work with your child from the storage of your device to suit the child most.

The Timer makes the passage of time visible by exploiting a strength that characterizes people with autism, namely visuo-spatial ability. This visual timer also eases the teaching as each activity is characterized by a moment of beginning and one of ending and makes it easier to move from one activity to another.
This timer tool has been designed to provide users with flexibility in customizing and editing to adapt their various purposes. In fact, users can insert photos taken at that moment through the device camera or select them (for example, photos of objects, rooms, people, and elements significant to the child) from the storage of your device. Importantly, Timer permits you to insert pleasant and interesting audios by selecting them from your device.
Furthermore, the innovation of the timer is the possibility of showing a predictable and concrete limit of the time remaining to carry out an activity (the image of the current activity disappears gradually, respecting its flow of time), or to make it predictable and concrete on how much time needed to wait before enjoying an appreciative activity (the image of the appreciative activity gradually appears respecting the flow of time). Finally, the child will enjoy the appreciative activity with the audio and pleasant animation.
The Visual Planning is a concrete and visual agenda of the sequence of activities which will take place over time to increase the predictability and reduce the uncertainty. It is possible to define a sequence of activities during a limited period of the day, for example during the session of speech therapy (namely Activity Planning), during the day (Daily Activity), during the week (Weekly Planning), or to remark important events in the month (Monthly Planning). The Visual Planning is also a customizable and easy-to-use tool for editing any element very quickly, clearly and structurally.
For Activity Planning, you have possibilities for building it together with the child by selecting the number of activities, then selecting images of the activities from which he/she can choose. There are two visual signals (color and symbols) to indicate who to choose the activity.
The Weekly Planning allows you to graphically represent the succession of days of the week with  the support of customizable color codes. This allows you to unify the color codes with different contexts, for example, school, park, therapy, etc.
The Monthly Planning using calendar supports the graphical representation of the passage of time through the possibility to cross the passing day to help the child manage the wait for the occurrence of a desired event.
The Token Economy is a flexible and effective behavioral program to motivate the person to perform a skill independently and to increase the frequency of appropriate behavior. The application allows you to define in clear way the final prize through a photo taken by cameras or from your device memory). Choose the type of "Token" more captivating for the child among some designs already available in the app. Token Economy provides you ability to download “token” images you want from Internet. You also can choose how many "tokens" necessary to reach the prize.

Kindly share us your reviews and feedback and share App4Autism with others. Thank you!

Including a variety of Puppy Dog Pals. You can both develop the sense of color and relax yourself. It can be played anytime, anywhere, easily share to social platforms.

Sharing on social networks is a must nowadays, and Puppy Dog Pals Drawing Book lets you do it easily. Fb, Twit, and Insta are the best fit in this case.

If you want your children to learn sense about colors and drawing then this app is for them!

title: Learn Colors & Shapes: Kids Car Race
description:
Want to teach colors and geometric shapes to your kids or like driving and painting for yourself? Just click on the Install button and get this exclusive all in one race car game for kids featuring learning to color match and shape names. This learning colours and shape games comes with amazing modes including all your desirable features plus kids’ favorite superhero characters. Teaching geometric shapes and colours to the kids has never been more exciting and fun before. Kids all time favorite superhero characters are their to teach them and make them learn about colours and geometric shapes as well as cars’ tyres assembly. Learning and playing through a single app is not a thing of past anymore. This beautiful cars for kids game comes with excellent graphics and colourful 3D environment. 

Drive huge cargo truck loaded with vehicles, all around the city in this kids coloring games and race car games for kids. Unload given vehicles at their allocated garages and paint them with your desired color to make them look beautiful and attractive. Freely roam in the colourful city but do keep track of time. Complete the driving, parking and painting in the given time to move on to the next level in this boys games and car fun kids games.

This game comes with three exciting and detailed educational game modes. In first mode your task is to replace the tyres of the vehicles parked in the grand city garage with their matching color and shape using your superhero characters. Be quick as you will have other levels to score as well and move on to the next mode. This mode is best for teaching geometric shapes and colors to your kids.In second mode of this kids games cars, your task is to drive and paint your vehicles. Drive your truck to the parking point, unload and paint all the vehicles from the color garage and park your truck in the end to win the level of this learn coloring and kids racing car games. Teach driving and painting with different colors in this mode. In third mode, drive your loaded truck all around the city and unload and park the vehicles with respect to their matching color garages in the given time to win the level.

You and your kids will have hours of fun together!

Have fun coloring with your children or do painting contests with them.

Features of  Learn Colors & Shapes: Kids Car Race

	•	Multiple color and car painting levels
	•	Different superhero characters to chose from
	•	Different paint and park challenges
	•	3 exciting game modes with multiple levels
	•	Smooth and realistic race handling
	•	High quality music and cute sound effects
	•	Amazing city 3d environment for learning & driving
	•	Best of top free games and a non wifi game

Click on the Install button and have fun with colors, shapes and superhero tyres assembly. 


Support and Feedback:

Your Feedbacks and ratings are Important for us to keep Game Pixels Studio  busy in creating more fun in the games to engage you, your family and your friends. In case if you find any bug that needed to be addressed just send us an email, we will improve it and reply to your email as soon as possible. Please try our other games by clicking More from Developer  or by visiting our publisher account.

title: Slime Factory Squishy Maker DIY Fun
description:
You are welcome to the world of slime making game and become the owner of your very own rainbow slime factory. Play this giant jelly toy squishy fun game now as there is hidden fun activity for your kids. Get ready for the preparation of the large amount of the fluffy squishy slime maker in the factory. Enjoy making it in the factory environment. Learn something unique and innovative that you haven’t learnt it before. Make your own slime jelly toy with simple ingredients to mix.


Follow the instructions of gooey jelly toy in the rainbow slime factory. Learn how to make the DIY fluffy slime in the fun learning activity educational game. Enter into the fluffy toy factory for make and play with colorful slime maker. The squishy goo make is the most amazing fun game in which you get to learn about how to make slime in the most perfect manner. See the magic inside the colorful slime factory and enjoy.


Pick up the ingredients first to make DIY slime. Just follow the instructions step by step. Download it now and make the huge amount of the fluffy shaving foam now in the slime maker factory. Mix all the DIY jelly ingredients in the mixer first to make the perfect shaving foam now. The step by step process starts from collecting the items required for the DIY jelly maker like butter giant slime ingredients as powder, toothpaste, glue, and face wash. Put all the ingredients in the slime maker mixer and mix them. Wait for the batter to cool down and then pour it into the drum.


Divide the fluffy toy into equal portions and add the rainbow colors in each. Now time to pour different rainbow slime into different bottles and let them cool. Now all the bottle go through the sampling bases of make and play DIY squishy jelly to test the slime maker process. The next step follows with fixing the caps of the DIY game jelly mix bottles to make them more secure. Next, the bottles go through a conveyor belt to smack labels on the bottle of DIY fluffy jelly shaving foam bottles. Now the rainbow slime is ready for the packaging and ready to deliver to the retail outlets

HOW TO PLAY:

-	Tap to start the squishy slime factory fun game
-	Collect all the jelly mix ingredients 
-	Mix all the ingredients and pour in the mixer to make the batter
-	Add rainbow colors to make the perfect rainbow jelly mix
-	Time to pour into the bottles and send them for the packaging
-	Set the package box for the slime delivery

FEATURES:

-	HD slime factory environment
-	Interactive and addictive gameplay sound effects
-	Complete process of how to make slime
-	Different colors to add for making rainbow slime
-	Amazing squishy jelly toy fun game

title: ABC Games - English for Kids
description:
English for Kids is an educational app for preschool-age children. 
It uses a laid-back game format to introduce little ones to letters of the English alphabet. 

Our ABC's are based on an original, proprietary methodology for learning English. 
Together with fun game characters, we will learn English letters, as well as a few words.

When you download English for Kids app for your child, you will get an interactive book with 26 illustrations, which we have written, drawn, and animated for you with great care and love. Speech recordings have been made by professional voice actors. 

Additional content, available for purchase in our English for Kids Alphabet app, offers practice assignments for reinforcing the acquired skills. 

We have prepared smart coloring pages featuring letters of the English alphabet, picture games for memorizing English words, and a fun children's game that will help your kid learn to spell certain English words.

Our games' advantage:
Colorful animated illustrations
Amusing characters
Fun poems
Specially authored content
No ads

We design our educational apps by incorporating recommendations made by experienced educators, child psychologists, and parents, while also keeping kids’ wishes in mind.

title: Babysitter Baby Care Fun Job
description:
Babysitting is fun, fun, fun! And in Babysitter Care Fun Job you can have fun any time and all the time!

Look after the cutest ickle baby, play games, splash around in bath time, fill that hungry tummy at feeding time or take them out into the big, wide world – whatever you want to do, we got you covered!

At bath time we’ve got a nice big bath filled with bubbles and warm water all ready for baby. Plop the little treasure into the water and cover him in suds then use the flannel to wash his face being careful not to get any soap into his eyes or mouth! Now baby can laugh and giggle while we wash all the bubbles off then it’s out of the water and on with the soothing lotion. All clean!

At lunchtime we’ve got two hungry little mouths to feed but never fear, with so many tasty treats to choose from, we just know that each of those cute little pot bellies will be full up in no time! Whisk them up a cool fruit smoothie, mix up a bottle of warm milk or try them on solids, it’s all up to you!

A good baby sitter doesn’t just look after the baby, they tidy up too! And baby’s room is a total mess, so you need to be ready to get in there and clear it all up in our fun sorting game. Tidy up was never as fun as this!

The playground is pack with fun for children of all ages but if you’re going to take baby out, you have to make sure it’s safe too. Before you can play together you’ll need to clean up the area! Then it’s time for fun in the sand box – what kind of amazing creation can you build for your toddler?

How about a trip to the beach? Everyone loves life in the surf! Get your beach towel, bring that parasol and get ready to play. Ice popsicles, sun, sea and sand, the best of fun all in one!

And after you’ve had a wonderful day together, you can fill the diary with wonderful memories of your time together. But best of all, you can do it all again tomorrow with Babysitter Baby Care Fun Job!
descriptionHTML:
Babysitting is fun, fun, fun! And in Babysitter Care Fun Job you can have fun any time and all the time!

Look after the cutest ickle baby, play games, splash around in bath time, fill that hungry tummy at feeding time or take them out into the big, wide world – whatever you want to do, we got you covered!

At bath time we’ve got a nice big bath filled with bubbles and warm water all ready for baby. Plop the little treasure into the water and cover him in suds then use the flannel to wash his face being careful not to get any soap into his eyes or mouth! Now baby can laugh and giggle while we wash all the bubbles off then it’s out of the water and on with the soothing lotion. All clean!

At lunchtime we’ve got two hungry little mouths to feed but never fear, with so many tasty treats to choose from, we just know that each of those cute little pot bellies will be full up in no time! Whisk them up a cool fruit smoothie, mix up a bottle of warm milk or try them on solids, it’s all up to you!

A good baby sitter doesn’t just look after the baby, they tidy up too! And baby’s room is a total mess, so you need to be ready to get in there and clear it all up in our fun sorting game. Tidy up was never as fun as this!

The playground is pack with fun for children of all ages but if you’re going to take baby out, you have to make sure it’s safe too. Before you can play together you’ll need to clean up the area! Then it’s time for fun in the sand box – what kind of amazing creation can you build for your toddler?

How about a trip to the beach? Everyone loves life in the surf! Get your beach towel, bring that parasol and get ready to play. Ice popsicles, sun, sea and sand, the best of fun all in one!

And after you’ve had a wonderful day together, you can fill the diary with wonderful memories of your time together. But best of all, you can do it all again tomorrow with Babysitter Baby Care Fun Job!
summary: Babysitter & baby care job! Babysitting is fun, fun, fun! Have fun all the time!

title: Social Skills for Autism 3 Kloogs Cosmic Classroom
description:
Kloog 3: Cosmic Classroom is the third app in the Social Skills for Autism series and continues the journey of our alien character Kloog through the social world that he finds difficult and challenging. 
This app takes the learner to Universe City where students can learn about classroom and break time behaviour, as well as recognising and dealing with stress. 
This app introduces the user to a range of wonderful and interesting new characters, who together will help the students and user to understand the classroom, break time and the complex area of stress.

title: Abecedario Español Gratuito
description:
Abecedario gratuito sin publicidad para niños de entre 3-6 años. Creada con material de maestros de primero y segundo de infantil por lo que puede usarse en escuelas y hogares como complemento de las clases.

Consigue que tus niños aprendan el abecedario de forma divertida e interactiva.

En esta versión de la aplicación encontrarás: 
 - Todo el abecedario español de la A a la G tanto en mayúsculas como en minúsculas.
 - 7 ejemplos de palabras por cada letra del abecedario.
 - Cada ficha contiene el sonido en español de la palabra para que asocie las palabras a las letras.
 - Todas las palabras tienen resaltada la letra a la que hacen referencia.
 - El niño aprenderá con el método de fichas a relacionar las palabras con las letras, igual que aprende en el colegio.

- Dos pequeños juegos con los que los niños reforzarán las palabras aprendidas del abecedario.

Este juego no contiene ningún tipo de publicidad, ni conexión a internet, ni nada que pueda ser indebido para menores.

Esta versión gratuita contiene las letras de la A a la G para que podáis ver como funciona la aplicación. Si es de vuestro agrado podéis conseguir la versión completa contribuyendo con una pequeña cantidad monetaria. Esto nos permitirá realizar más aplicaciones educativas y seguras para los niños sin ningún tipo de publicidad. Tú estarás tranquilo mientras tus hijos aprenden jugando.

title: Sweet BabyGirl Princess Palace House Cleaning Game
description:
In Sweet Baby Girl Princess Palace House Cleaning game we shall clean the all things which are necessary in a house. In Cleaning game We learn how to house cleaning, dirty house cleaning, house decorating with kids house cleaning process and girl house cleaning process to make the house neat and clean like a beautiful princess house cleanup. You have to do it step by step in this games. Steps are:  

                                                                   Washroom cleanup 

 Clean the toilet. Cleaning the toilet is never fun, so it’s best to get it over with as soon as possible. Put on a pair of rubber gloves to keep your hands safe from the grime and bacteria. 

 Clean the shower or tub. Showers are notorious for getting grimy quickly. A shower cleaner and bristled brush should work great. If you don’t have shower cleaner handy, dish washing liquid is an excellent way to get rid of the scum in the bottom of the tub, just like it cuts the grease off your dishes.


Clean the sink. Most sinks are pretty heavy duty, but before you go to use any cleaner, make sure it’s appropriate for your surface. Once you’re sure it is, spray it down. Leave it for a minute to start eating away the bacteria and mildew, and then scrub it down with some elbow grease and a sturdy sponge. 


Clean the glass/mirrors.First, wash your glass with a solution of warm or hot water, dish soap with a rag, sponge, or squeegee.


                                                                  Cleaning the Kitchen

Wash the dishes.  use dishwasher. 
Try hand-washing dishes, too. you will rarely need to soak anything or scrub hard because the food juices won't have a chance to dry and harden. 

Dry your dishes, too. If you don’t dry the dishes, you risk water stains on glass or bacteria festering in the water. 

Clean the oven and microwave. Another not very fun task is the cleaning the microwave and the oven, especially if we don't clean them very often (they're easy to forget about).

Organize the cabinets. Now that you've got the hard part out of the way, it's time to get to your cabinets. 


                                                                 Cleaning the Bedroom

Organize all the clutter. Again, we’re starting from the top down here. The first step to organizing any room is to get rid of or organize all the small bits. 

Make the bed. Sure, making the bed seems pretty pointless – after all, you’re just going to mess it up come nightfall.


Organize your closet.  Then get to organizing, keeping like items together and the articles you wear most on top.


Dust, vacuum or mop, and spray a nice scent into the room. Once everything is dusted, corners of the floor included, you can vacuum or mop accordingly.


                                                                 Cleaning the Car and Garage

Park your car in a shaded area.
Gather your supplies.
Fill two buckets with water.
Rinse the car with a hose.
Clean from the top of your car down to the bottom. 
Cleaning the Wheels
Clean your empty garage thoroughly.




                                                      Cleaning General Living Areas

Clean the floor. 

Mop your floor

Fight against fleas, if you have pets. 

Dust the furniture. 

Polish the wood furniture. 

Be careful using all-purpose cleaners. 

Organize the knickknacks and fluff the pillows. 



                                                           Wrapping Up Your Cleaning Session

Don’t forget to clean outside, too. 

Do the laundry with a washing machine or by hand. 

Dry your laundry. 


Walk through your house and complete any remaining room-specific cleaning necessary. 
      Emptying trash bins and taking out the trash
      Cleaning the kitchen table
      Changing bedsheets, pillowcases, and duvet covers
      Cleaning walls
      Clean the refrigerator

title: Fishing - Alphabet, Color, Numbers games for kids
description:
Welcome to SKIDOS!  Let your 5-11 year olds enjoy our wide range of fun learning games. 
SKIDOS games including Kids Fishing help kids master their mathematics skills and develop their interest in coding. You may subscribe to SKIDOS from within this app or you can log in to an existing account to get started. SKIDOS subscriptions are auto renewable with monthly & annual plans for 3 users. So, three kids of different age can learn and progress in their own individual learning style.

SKIDOS Kids Fishing Game:
Catch it while you can! In the Fishing Game, you have to catch all the fish while their mouth is gaping, otherwise you might scare them away! Try the two player mode and play with your friends for a great multiplayer experience!

Game features:
-5 game modes: Fun classic, Letter Hunt, Number Hunt, Color Splash and Jumbo Game 
-Choose between Single player or Multiplayer modes
-Friendly and easy to use for very young kids including preschool
-Fun animation to keep kids engaged
-Child-friendly scoring system to encourage
-Practices early literacy and numeracy
-Practice math and coding
-Available in multiple languages

DEAR PARENTS & TEACHERS,

SKIDOS apps are designed first as super fun games that children already LOVE playing. Then, we integrate the interactive learning content into them. That’s why kids ACTUALLY love our games.

HELP YOUR KIDS LEARN MATH & CODING
All SKIDOS games turn classroom lessons into fun and interactive challenges.

In this updated version, we added much more playfulness and even more interactive ways for your kids to strengthen their math skills! Our improved math questions are now more visual and dynamic, for a more engaging and fun experience.
        
Kids love playing games. Why not teach them the logic behind their favorite games? With SKIDOS games, they can get inspired and interested in programming from a young age.

LEARNING THROUGH PLAY
Kids LOVE mobile games. We LOVE building games. All SKIDOS games are predominantly designed as fun engaging games and then integrated with interactive learning content.

CUSTOMIZED LEARNING AND PRACTICE
Kids have different learning styles. All SKIDOS games give children the option to pick their subject (mathematics or coding), grade and topic, and progress with problem solving.

START CRACKING CODING AND LOVING MATH
All learning content in SKIDOS games are aligned to the national standards for Mathematics and cover a comprehensive list of topics.

These include number sense, addition, subtraction, multiplication and division as well as fractions, decimals, geometry and so much more!

For kids who are interested in coding, SKIDOS has developed a unique curriculum which teaches them concepts around basic programming and computational thinking.

All SKIDOS games have 20 levels on how to move objects, which help the kids to understand the logic of game coding.

All SKIDOS games are COPPA and GDPR compliant and have no third-party advertising.

SPECIAL OFFER:
Get 6 year LEARNING PACK for 3 users and play all SKIDOS GAMES UNLIMITED for 6 years!

Subscription info:
- SKIDOS has monthly & annual auto-renewable subscription plans  for 3 users
- Payment will be charged to Google Play Account after free trial period.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user & auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
- Cancellation will not go into effect until the end of the billing cycle
More details can be found at: http://skidos.com/subscription
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Our privacy policy can be found at: http://skidos.com/privacy-policy
For support, write to us at: support@skidos.com
